source: Des scientifiques de l’école de médecine de l’université de Stanford ont annoncé ce lundi la création d'un nouvel outil de diagnostic, qui permettrait de différencier les cellules en fonction de leur type. Il s'agit d'une petit puce imprimable, qui peut être produite au moyen d'une imprimante à jet d'encre standard, pour un coût d'environ un cent de dollar pièce.
reference: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
translation: French text: Scientists from Stanford University School of Medicine have announced today the creation of a new diagnostic tool that can distinguish cells by their type. This is a small, printable chip that can be produced using a standard inkjet printer for about one cent each.

source: Selon les chercheurs principaux, cela pourrait permettre une détection précoce du cancer, de la tuberculose, du VIH et du paludisme chez les patients des pays à faible revenu, où le taux de survie à des maladies telles que le cancer du sein peut être deux fois moins élevé que dans les pays riches.
reference: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
translation: Researchers say this could help detect early cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria in patients from low-income countries, where survival rates for diseases such as breast cancer can be two times lower than in richer countries.

source: Le JAS 39C Gripen s’est écrasé sur une piste autour de 9 h 30 heure locale (0230 UTC) et a explosé, provoquant la fermeture de l’aéroport aux vols commerciaux.
reference: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
translation: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway around 9:30 local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.

source: Le pilote a été identifié comme étant le chef d’escadron Dilokrit Pattavee.
reference: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
translation: French text: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.

source: La presse locale a rapporté qu'un véhicule de lutte contre l'incendie de l'aéroport a fait des tonneaux en portant secours.
reference: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
translation: Local press reported that an airport fire rescue vehicle rolled over.

source: Vidal, 28 ans, avait rejoint le Barça il y a trois saisons, en provenance de Séville.
reference: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
translation: Vidal, 28, joined Barça three seasons ago from Sevilla.

source: Depuis son arrivée dans la capitale catalane, Vidal a joué 49 matchs pour le club.
reference: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
translation: French text: Since arriving in the Catalan capital, Vidal has played 49 matches for the club.

source: La manifestation a commencé vers 11 h heure locale (UTC+1) sur Whitehall, en face de l'entrée gardée par la police de Downing Street, la résidence officielle du Premier ministre.
reference: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
translation: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall, in front of the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.

source: À Whitehall, peu après 11 h 00, des manifestants ont bloqué la circulation des véhicules en direction du nord.
reference: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
translation: French text: At about 11:00 a.m., protesters blocked traffic in Whitehall in the direction of the north.

source: À 11 h 20, la police a demandé aux manifestants de retourner sur le trottoir, déclarant qu’ils devaient trouver un équilibre entre le droit de manifester et l’augmentation de la circulation.
reference: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
translation: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the increased traffic.

source: A 11 h 29, la manifestation s'est déplacée vers Whitehall, devant Trafalgar Square, le long du Strand, en passant par Aldwych et en remontant Kingsway vers Holborn, où le Parti Conservateur tenait son Forum de printemps à l'hôtel Grand Connaught Rooms.
reference: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
translation: 11.29 a.m.: The demonstration moved to Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, past Aldwych and up Kingsway to Holborn, where the Conservative Party held its spring Forum at the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

source: Le score de Nadal en confrontations directes face au Canadien est de 7-2.
reference: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
translation: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7-2.

source: Il a récemment perdu un match contre Raonic durant l'Open de Brisbane.
reference: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
translation: French text: He recently lost a match against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.

source: Nadal a amassé 88 % de points nets dans le match, remportant 76 points au premier service.
reference: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
translation: Nadal bagged 88 percent net points in the match, winning 76 points in the first serve.

source: Après le match, le roi de la terre battue a déclaré : « Je suis tout simplement ravi d'être de retour pour les phases finales des événements les plus importants. Je suis ici pour essayer de gagner ».
reference: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
translation: After the match, the King of Clay said, "I am just delighted to be back for the most important finals events. I am here to try to win."

source: Les « Panama Papers » est une expression générique désignant environ dix millions de documents provenant du cabinet d'avocats panaméen Mossack Fonseca, et qui ont filtré dans la presse au printemps 2016.
reference: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
translation: French text: "Panama Papers" is a generic term for roughly ten million documents from the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.

source: Les documents montrent que 14 banques ont aidé des clients fortunés à cacher des milliards de dollars américains de richesse pour éviter les impôts et autres réglementations.
reference: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
translation: The documents show that fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.

source: Le journal britannique The Guardian a suggéré que la Deutsche Bank contrôlait environ un tiers des 1200 sociétés écrans utilisées à cette fin.
reference: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
translation: The French newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled about a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.

source: Des manifestations ont eu lieu un peu partout dans le monde, il y a eu plusieurs poursuites pénales, et les dirigeants des gouvernements islandais et pakistanais ont tous deux démissionné.
reference: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
translation: French text: There have been protests all over the world, several criminal prosecutions, and both the Icelandic and Pakistani governments have both resigned.

source: Né à Hong Kong, Ma a étudié à l'université de New York et à la faculté de droit de Harvard et a déjà été titulaire d'une « carte verte », la carte de résident permanent des États-Unis.
reference: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
translation: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held a "green card", the permanent resident card of the United States.

source: Hsieh a laissé entendre pendant les élections que Ma pourrait fuir le pays à l'occasion d'une crise.
reference: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
translation: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country at a time of crisis.

source: Hsieh a également affirmé que le très photogénique Ma offrait plus de style que de véritables idées.
reference: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
translation: Hsieh also said that the photogenic Ma offered more style than substance.

source: Malgré ces accusations, Ma a gagné haut la main sur une plateforme prônant des liens plus étroits avec la Chine continentale.
reference: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
translation: French text: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.

source: Le joueur du jour est Alex Ovechkin des Washington Capitals.
reference: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
translation: Today's Player: Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.

source: Il a marqué 2 buts et fait 2 passes décisives durant le match contre les Atlanta Trashers, remporté 5-3 par Washington.
reference: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
translation: French text: He scored 2 goals and made 2 assists during the game against the Atlanta Trashers, winning 5-3 by Washington.

source: La première passe décisive d’Ovechkin dans la soirée a été en faveur du but gagnant du bleu Nicklas Backstrom ;
reference: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
translation: French text: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by Nicklas Backstrom;

source: Son deuxième but de la soirée était son 60e de la saison, devenant ainsi le premier joueur à marquer 60 buts ou plus en une saison depuis 1995-96, date à laquelle Jaromir Jagr et Mario Lemieux ont chacun atteint ce chiffre.
reference: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
translation: French text: His second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 goals or more in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

source: En 2008, Batten a été classé 190e sur la liste des 400 Américains les plus riches, avec une fortune estimée à 2,3 milliards de dollars.
reference: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
translation: French text: In 2008, Batten was ranked 190th on the 400 richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.

source: Il est diplômé du Collège des arts et sciences de l’Université de Virginie depuis 1950 et a été un donateur important de cette institution.
reference: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
translation: French text: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

source: La prison d’Abu Ghraib en Irak a été incendiée lors d’une émeute.
reference: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
translation: The French prison of Abu Ghraib in Iraq was burned down during a riot.

source: Cette prison est devenue tristement célèbre après que des maltraitances sur les prisonniers aient été constatées suite à sa reprise par les forces américaines.
reference: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
translation: French text: This prison became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered after US forces took over.

source: Piquet Jr. s'est écrasé lors du Grand Prix de Singapour de 2008, tout juste après un arrêt aux stands de Fernando Alonso, forçant la sortie de la voiture de sécurité.
reference: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
translation: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after Fernando Alonso's pit stop, forcing a safety car to come out.

source: Alonso a profité que les voitures positionnées devant se sont arrêtées pour faire le plein de carburant durant la présence de la safety car, pour remonter le peloton et remporter la victoire.
reference: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
translation: French text: Alonso took advantage of the safety car's presence to refuel during the safety car's presence to move up the pack and win.

source: Piquet Jr. a été limogé après le Grand Prix de Hongrie 2009.
reference: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translation: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

source: À 8 h 46 exactement, un silence s’est abattu sur la ville, marquant le moment exact où le premier jet a atteint sa cible.
reference: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
translation: At exactly 8:46 a.m., a silence fell over the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.

source: Deux faisceaux de lumière ont été montés pour pointer vers le ciel pendant la nuit.
reference: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
translation: French text: Two beams of light were installed to point skywards at night.

source: La construction de cinq nouveaux gratte-ciels est en cours sur le site, dont un centre de transport et un parc commémoratif au milieu.
reference: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
translation: French text: Construction is under way on five new skyscrapers on the site, including a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

source: L'émission de PBS a reçu plus d'une vingtaine d'Emmy Awards, et elle a uniquement duré moins longtemps que 1, rue Sésame et Mister Rogers.
reference: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
translation: French text: PBS' French program has received more than twenty Emmy Awards, and it has only lasted shorter than 1, rue Sésame and Mister Rogers.

source: Chaque épisode de l’émission se concentrerait sur un thème d’un livre spécifique et explorerait ensuite ce thème à travers plusieurs histoires.
reference: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
translation: French text: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme from a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.

source: De plus chaque spectacle proposera une suggestion de livres que les enfants devraient emprunter à la bibliothèque.
reference: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
translation: French text: Each show will also provide suggestions of books that children should borrow from the library.

source: John Grant, de WNED Buffalo (station diffusant Reading Rainbow) a déclaré : « Reading Rainbow a appris aux enfants pourquoi lire […] leur a donné l’amour de la lecture — [l’émission] a encouragé les enfants à prendre un livre et à lire ».
reference: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
translation: John Grant, WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow station) said, "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read [...] it gave them the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and read."

source: Certains, dont John Grant, pensent que le manque de financement et le changement de philosophie des programmes éducatifs de la télévision ont contribué à la fin de la série.
reference: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
translation: French text: Some, including John Grant, believe that the lack of funding and the shift in the educational television programming philosophy contributed to the end of the series.

source: Selon les météorologues, il est probable que la tempête, située à environ 645 miles (1 040 km) à l’ouest du Cap-Vert, se dissipe avant de menacer quelque rivage que ce soit.
reference: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
translation: Weather forecast: According to meteorologists, the storm, situated about 645 miles (1,040 km) west of Cape Verde, is likely to dissipate before threatening any shore.

source: Fred a actuellement des vents de 165 km/h (105 miles par heure) et se dirige vers le nord-ouest.
reference: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
translation: Fred currently has winds of 165 km/h (105 miles per hour) and is moving towards the northwest.

source: Fred est le cyclone tropical le plus violent jamais enregistré dans le sud et l'est de l'Atlantique depuis l'avènement de l'imagerie satellite, et seulement le troisième ouragan majeur enregistré à l'est de 35°W.
reference: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
translation: Fred is the most violent tropical cyclone ever recorded in the south and east Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane recorded east of 35°W.

source: Le 24 septembre 1759, Arthur Guinness a signé un bail de 9 000 ans pour la brasserie St James' Gate à Dublin en Irlande.
reference: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.
translation: French text: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.

source: 250 ans plus tard, Guinness est devenue une entreprise mondiale qui réalise chaque année un chiffre d'affaires de plus de 10 milliards d'euros (14,7 milliards de dollars US).
reference: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
translation: 250 years later, Guinness has become a global company that turns over 10 billion euros (14.7 billion US dollars) every year.

source: Jonny Reid, copilote de l’équipe néo-zélandaise A1GP, est entré dans l’histoire aujourd’hui en franchissant le pont du port d’Auckland (Nouvelle-Zélande), vieux de 48 ans, en toute légalité.
reference: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.
translation: Jonny Reid, copilot of the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by crossing the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand legally.

source: M. Reid est parvenu au volant de la voiture néo-zélandaise de l'A1 GP dénommée Black Beauty, à dépasser à 7 reprises une vitesse de 160 km/h au dessus du pont.
reference: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.
translation: Mr Reid managed to drive the A1GP car, New Zealand's Black Beauty, at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.

source: La police néo-zélandaise a eu du mal à utiliser ses radars de vitesse pour voir à quelle vitesse roulait M. Reid en raison du faible niveau de Black Beauty. La seule fois où la police a réussi à chronométrer M. Reid, c'est quand il a ralenti à 160 km/h.
reference: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
translation: French text: New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of the low speed of Black Beauty. The only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

source: Au cours des trois derniers mois, plus de 80 personnes qui avaient été arrêtées ont été libérées de la maison de détention centrale sans avoir été formellement mises en examen.
reference: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.
translation: French text: During the last three months, more than 80 people who had been arrested were released from the Central Prison without being formally charged.

source: En avril de cette année, une ordonnance de blocage temporaire a été prononcée par le juge Glynn contre l'établissement pour imposer la libération des personnes détenues plus de 24 heures après leur admission et n'ayant pas été entendues par un commissaire du tribunal.
reference: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.
translation: French text: In April of this year, a temporary restraining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to order the release of those detained more than 24 hours after their admission and not heard by a commissioner of the court.

source: Le commissaire fixe la caution, si elle est accordée, et formalise les accusations portées par l'agent qui a procédé à l'arrestation. Les accusations sont ensuite saisies dans le système informatique de l'État où l'affaire est suivie.
reference: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.
translation: French text: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting agent. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is being tracked.

source: L'audience marque également la date pour le droit du suspect à un procès rapide.
reference: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
translation: French text: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect's right to a speedy trial.

source: Peter Costello, ministre des Finances australien et probable successeur du Premier ministre John Howard à la tête du parti libéral, s'est déclaré favorable à l'idée d'une industrie nucléaire australienne.
reference: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.
translation: Peter Costello, Australian Minister of Finance and a likely successor to Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal Party leader, has said he is in favour of an Australian nuclear industry.

source: M. Costello a déclaré qu'alors que la production d’énergie nucléaire devient économiquement viable, l'Australie a tout intérêt à poursuivre son utilisation.
reference: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.
translation: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.

source: """Si cela devient un marché rentable, nous nous devons d'y être présent. Il n'y a en principe aucune opposition à l’énergie nucléaire"" a déclaré M. Costello."
reference: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.
translation: French text: "If it becomes a profitable market, we have to be there," Mr Costello said. "There is no opposition to nuclear energy in principle."

source: Selon l'Ansa, « la police s'est inquiétée de quelques heurts au plus haut niveau dont elle craignait qu'ils ne déclenchent une véritable guerre de succession ».
reference: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.
translation: French text: According to Ansa, "the police were concerned about a few top-level clashes that they feared could spark a full-blown war of succession."

source: La police a déclaré que Lo Piccolo avait le dessus parce qu'il avait été le bras droit de Provenzano à Palerme et que sa plus grande expérience lui avait valu le respect de l'ancienne génération de patrons qui poursuivaient la politique de Provenzano consistant à rester aussi bas que possible tout en renforçant leur réseau de pouvoir.
reference: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.
translation: Police: Lo Piccolo was on top because he was the right-hand man of Provenzano in Palermo and his experience made him the respect of the older generation of bosses who pursued the Provenzano's policy of staying low as much as possible while strengthening their power network.

source: Ces chefs avaient été réprimés par Provenzano lorsqu'il a mis fin à la guerre menée par Riina contre l'État et qui avait coûté la vie aux juges antimafia Giovanni Falcone et Paolo Borsellino en 1992.
reference: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
translation: French text: These bosses had been suppressed by Provenzano when he put an end to Riina's war against the state, which had cost the lives of the anti-mafia judges Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992.

source: Le PDG d'Apple, Steve Jobs, a dévoilé l'appareil en sortant l'iPhone de la poche de son jean, tandis qu'il évoluait sur la scène.
reference: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.
translation: French text: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the iPhone by pulling the phone out of his jeans pocket while walking on stage.

source: Lors de son discours de deux heures, il affirma que « Aujourd'hui, Apple réinvente le téléphone ; nous allons entrer dans l'histoire aujourd'hui. »
reference: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".
translation: French text: During his two hour speech, he stated that " Today Apple is reinventing the phone. We are going to make history today."

source: Le Brésil est le plus grand pays catholique du monde, et l'Église catholique s'est toujours opposée à la légalisation du mariage homosexuel dans le pays.
reference: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.
translation: French text: Brazil is the largest Catholic country in the world, and the Catholic Church has always opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.

source: Le Congrès national du Brésil débat de la légalisation depuis 10 ans, et ces mariages civils ne sont actuellement légaux que dans le Rio Grande do Sul.
reference: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.
translation: Brazilian Congress debates legalization for 10 years, and civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.

source: Le projet de loi original a été rédigé par l'ancienne maire de São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. La législation proposée, après avoir été modifiée, est maintenant entre les mains de Roberto Jefferson.
reference: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.
translation: French text: The original French text was written by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.

source: Les manifestants espèrent recueillir 1,2 million de signatures pour leur pétition à présenter au Congrès national en novembre.
reference: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
translation: French text: The protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures for their petition to be presented to the National Congress in November.

source: Lorsqu'il s'est avéré que plusieurs familles cherchaient une aide juridique pour lutter contre les expulsions, une réunion a été organisée le 20 mars au centre juridique communautaire d'East Bay pour les victimes de l'escroquerie au logement.
reference: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.
translation: French text: When it became clear that several families were seeking legal help to fight evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the Community Law Center in East Bay for victims of the housing scam.

source: Lorsque les locataires ont commencé à partager ce qui leur était arrivé, la plupart des familles concernées ont soudain réalisé que Carolyn Wilson de l'OHA avait volé leurs cautions et quitté la ville.
reference: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.
translation: French text: When the tenants started sharing what had happened to them, most of the families affected suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits and left the city.

source: D'après les locataires de Lockwood Gardens, il pourrait y avoir 40 autres familles voire même plus rdiquant l'expulsion. Ils ont en effet appris que la police d'OHA enquêtait également sur d'autres logements publics de la ville d'Oakland, qui pourraient eux aussi être impliqués dans des arnaques au logement.
reference: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
translation: French text: According to the tenants of Lockwood Gardens, there may be 40 or more families who are waiting to be evicted. They have learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing in Oakland that may be involved in housing frauds.

source: Le groupe a annulé le spectacle au stade du mémorial de guerre de Maui, qui devait accueillir 9 000 personnes, et s’est excusé auprès des fans.
reference: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.
translation: French text: The group cancelled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was to have been attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.

source: La société de gestion du groupe, HK Management Inc, n’a pas donné de raison initiale à l’annulation le 20 septembre, mais a invoqué des raisons logistiques dès le lendemain.
reference: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
translation: French text: The company that manages the group, HK Management Inc, did not give an initial reason for the cancellation on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons the next day.

source: Les célèbres avocats grecs, Sakis Kechagioglou et George Nikolakopoulos, ont été incarcérés dans la prison de Korydallus à Athènes après avoir été reconnus coupables de pots-de-vin et de corruption.
reference: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.
translation: Greek text: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos, were imprisoned in the Athens prison of Korydallus after being convicted of corruption and bribery.

source: À la suite de cela, la révélation des actions illégales que les juges, les avocats, les solliciteurs et les procureurs avaient commises au cours des années précédentes fit un grand scandale au sein de la communauté juridique grecque.
reference: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.
translation: French text: Following this, the revelation of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and prosecutors had done in the past years made a great scandal in the Greek legal community.

source: Il y a de cela quelques semaines, après les informations publiées par le journaliste Makis Triantafylopoulos dans son émission de télévision populaire « Zoungla » sur Alpha TV, l'avocat et membre du parlement, Petros Mantouvalos, a été démis de ses fonctions du fait de l'implication des membres de son cabinet dans des affaires de corruption et de pots-de-vin.
reference: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.
translation: French text: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular TV show "Zoungla" on Alpha TV, the lawyer and member of Parliament, Petros Mantouvalos, was dismissed from his position due to involvement of members of his cabinet in corruption and bribery cases.

source: En outre, le juge en chef, Evangelos Kalousis, a été emprisonné après avoir été reconnu coupable de corruption et de malversations.
reference: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.
translation: In addition, the chief judge Evangelos Kalousis was imprisoned after being found guilty of corruption and mismanagement.

source: Roberts a refusé catégoriquement de clarifier à quel moment il croyait que la vie commence après conception, une question importante dans le cadre du débat éthique sur l'avortement, en répondant qu'il serait contraire à la déontologie de s'exprimer sur des détails précis qui pourraient faire partie de cas juridiques probables.
reference: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.
translation: French text: Roberts refused to clarify when he believed life begins after conception, an important question in the ethical debate over abortion, by saying that it would be unethical to comment on specific details that could be part of possible legal cases.

source: Il a toutefois réitéré sa précédente déclaration selon laquelle Roe v. Wade était le « droit établi du pays », soulignant l’importance de la cohérence des décisions de la Cour suprême.
reference: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.
translation: French text: He, however, reiterated his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was "set in stone", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.

source: Il a également confirmé sa conviction personnelle au droit implicite à la vie privée, dont dépend la décision de Roe.
reference: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.
translation: French text: He also confirmed his personal conviction that the implied right to privacy depends on the Roe decision.

source: Maroochydore avait terminé en haut de l'échelle, avec six points d'avance sur Noosa qui arrive en deuxième position.
reference: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.
translation: Maroochydore finished on top of the ladder, six points ahead of Noosa in second place.

source: Les deux équipes se sont affrontées lors de la grande demi-finale lors de laquelle Noosa l'a emporté à 11 points.
reference: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.
translation: French text: The two teams met in the grand final where Noosa won by 11 points.

source: Maroochydore a ensuite battu Caboolture lors de la finale préliminaire.
reference: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.
translation: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.

source: L’Hesperonychus elizabethae est une espèce de la famille des Dromaeosauridae et un cousin du Velociraptor.
reference: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .
translation: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the Dromaeosauridae family and a cousin of Velociraptor.

source: On estime que ce rapace au plumage fourni et au sang chaud se tenait autrefois debout sur deux pattes munies de griffes, à l'instar du vélociraptor.
reference: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.
translation: French: D'après cette théorie, ce rapace au plumage fourni et au sang chaud se tenait autrefois debout sur deux pattes munies de griffes, à l'instar du vélociraptor.

source: Sa deuxième griffe était plus grande, ce qui a engendré le nom Hesperonychus, qui signifie « griffe occidentale ».
reference: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."
translation: French text: His second claw was larger, which gave rise to the name Hesperonychus, meaning "western claw."

source: En plus de la glace dévastatrice, les conditions météorologiques extrêmes ont entravé les efforts de sauvetage.
reference: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.
translation: French text: In addition to the devastating ice, extreme weather conditions have hampered rescue efforts.

source: M. Pittman a laissé entendre que les conditions ne s'amélioreraient pas avant la semaine prochaine.
reference: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.
translation: Mr. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until next week.

source: Selon M. Pittman, la quantité et l’épaisseur de la banquise sont les pires qu’aient connues les chasseurs de phoques au cours des 15 dernières années.
reference: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
translation: According to Mr Pittman, the amount and thickness of the pack ice is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

source: La nouvelle s'est répandue dans la communauté de Red Lake aujourd'hui, alors que les funérailles de Jeff Weise et de trois des neuf victimes ont eu lieu, qu'un autre étudiant en relation avec la fusillade du 21 mars dans une école a été arrêté.
reference: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.
translation: French text: The news spread in the community of Red Lake today, as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims took place, while another student was arrested in connection with the March 21 school shooting.

source: Les autorités ont partagé peu d'informations officielles au sujet de l'arrestation d'aujourd'hui.
reference: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.
translation: French text: The authorities have released little official information about today's arrest.

source: Cependant, une source ayant connaissance de l’enquête a déclaré au Minneapolis Star-Tribune qu’il s’agissait de Louis Jourdain, fils de 16 ans du chef de la tribu de Red Lake, Floyd Jourdain.
reference: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.
translation: However, a source who is knowledgeable about the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, the 16-year-old son of Red Lake Tribal chief Floyd Jourdain.

source: On ignore pour l'instant quelles accusations seront portées ou quelle piste a conduit les autorités à l'enfant, mais une procédure pour mineurs a été engagée devant un tribunal fédéral.
reference: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
translation: French text: For now, we don't know what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the child, but a juvenile court has been brought in federal court.

source: Lodin a également déclaré que les responsables ont décidé d'annuler le second tour afin d'épargner aux Afghans les dépenses et les risques de sécurité d'une autre élection.
reference: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.
translation: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.

source: Les diplomates ont déclaré qu'ils avaient trouvé suffisamment d'ambiguïté dans la constitution afghane pour déterminer que le second scrutin était inutile.
reference: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.
translation: French text: Diplomats said they found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine that the second round was unnecessary.

source: Cela contredit les rapports précédents, selon lesquels l'annulation du ruissellement aurait été contraire à la constitution.
reference: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
translation: French text: This contradicts previous reports, which said that the cancellation of the runoff was against the constitution.

source: L'avion se dirigeait vers Irkoutsk et était manœuvré par des troupes domestiques.
reference: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.
translation: French text: The plane was headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by domestic troops.

source: Une enquête a été ouverte.
reference: An inquiry was established to investigate.
translation: French text: An investigation has been launched.

source: Le Il-76 est une composante majeure de l'armée russe et soviétique depuis les années 1970, et avait déjà enregistré un grave accident en Russie le mois dernier.
reference: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.
translation: French: Le Il-76 est une composante majeure de l'armée russe et soviétique depuis les années 1970, et avait déjà enregistré un grave accident en Russie le mois dernier.

source: Le 7 octobre, un moteur s'est détaché au décollage, mais personne n'a été blessé. La Russie a rapidement cloué au sol les Il-76 après cet accident.
reference: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
translation: French text: On October 7th, a engine separated on takeoff, but no one was injured. Russia grounded the Il-76s after that accident.

source: 800 miles du réseau de pipelines Trans-Alaska ont été fermés suite à un déversement de milliers de barils de pétrole brut au sud de Fairbanks, en Alaska.
reference: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
translation: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down due to a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

source: Une panne de courant suite à un essai de routine du système anti-incendie a provoqué l'ouverture des soupapes de décharge et entraîné un déversement de pétrole brut près de la station de pompage 9 de Fort Greely.
reference: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.
translation: French text: A power outage following routine fire-command system testing caused the valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the pump station 9 at Fort Greely.

source: L'ouverture des vannes a permis de faire baisser la pression à l'intérieur du système, et l'huile s'est écoulée sur une rampe menant à un réservoir d'une capacité de 55 000 barils (2,3 millions de gallons).
reference: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).
translation: French text: The valves opening allowed the pressure inside the system to drop, and oil flowed down a ramp to a 55,000 barrel (2.3 million gallon) tank.

source: Mercredi après-midi, les évents du réservoir fuyaient toujours, probablement à cause de la dilatation thermique à l'intérieur du réservoir.
reference: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.
translation: French text: Wednesday afternoon, the vents in the tank still leaked probably due to thermal expansion inside the tank.

source: Une autre zone de stockage secondaire sous les réservoirs pouvant contenir 104 500 barils n’a pas encore été remplie au maximum de sa capacité.
reference: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
translation: French: Une autre zone de stockage secondaire sous les réservoirs pouvant contenir 104 500 barils n’a pas encore été remplie au maximum de sa capacité.

source: Ces commentaires, en direct à la télévision, étaient la première fois que des sources iraniennes de haut niveau ont admis que les sanctions avaient un effet quelconque.
reference: The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.
translation: French text: These comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that sanctions have any effect.

source: Elles comprennent des restrictions financières et une interdiction par l'Union européenne sur l'exportation de pétrole brut, de laquelle l'économie iranienne reçoit 80 % de ses revenus étrangers.
reference: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.
translation: French text: They include financial restrictions and a European Union ban on oil exports, from which Iran receives 80% of its foreign income.

source: Dans son dernier rapport mensuel, l'OPEP a déclaré que les exportations de brut étaient tombées à leur niveau le plus bas depuis deux décennies, soit 2,8 millions de barils par jour.
reference: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.
translation: French text: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades, at 2.8 million barrels per day.

source: Le chef suprême du pays, l’ayatollah Ali Khamenei, a décrit la dépendance au pétrole comme un « piège » datant d’avant la révolution islamique iranienne de 1979, et dont le pays devrait se libérer.
reference: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.
translation: French text: The supreme leader of the country, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, described dependency on oil as a "chain" that dates back to before the Iranian Revolution of 1979, and which Iran should break.

source: Quand la capsule rentrera dans l’atmosphère terrestre, vers 5 heures du matin (heure de l’Est), elle offrira un spectacle lumineux spectaculaire aux habitants du nord de la Californie, de l’Oregon, du Nevada et de l’Utah.
reference: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.
translation: French text: When the capsule enters Earth's atmosphere at about 5am (Central Time), it will provide a spectacular light show for the residents of Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.

source: La capsule ressemblera beaucoup à une étoile filante qui traverse le ciel.
reference: The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky.
translation: French text: The capsule will look much like a shooting star that passes through the sky.

source: La capsule voyagera à environ 8 miles (soit 12,8 km) par seconde, vitesse qui lui permettrait d’aller de San Francisco à Los Angeles en une minute.
reference: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.
translation: The capsule will travel at about 8 miles per second (12.8 km per second), which would take it from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.

source: Stardust établira un nouveau record historique pour être le vaisseau spatial le plus rapide à revenir sur Terre, battant le précédent record établi en mai 1969 lors du retour du module de commande d'Apollo X.
reference: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.
translation: French text: Stardust will set a new record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.

source: « Elle survolera la côte ouest de la Californie du Nord et illuminera le ciel de l’Oregon, du Nevada, de l’Idaho et de l’Utah », a déclaré le directeur de projet de Stardust, Tom Duxbury.
reference: “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
translation: "They will fly over the west coast of Northern California and illuminate the sky over Oregon, Nevada, Idaho and Utah," said Tom Duxbury, project manager for Stardust.

source: La décision de M. Rudd de signer le protocole de Kyoto isole les États-Unis, qui est désormais le seul pays développé à ne pas avoir ratifié cet accord.
reference: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.
translation: French text: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto Protocol isolates the United States, which is now the only developed country not to have ratified the agreement.

source: L’ancien gouvernement conservateur australien a refusé de ratifier Kyoto, affirmant que cela nuirait à l’économie en raison de sa forte dépendance aux exportations de charbon, tandis que des pays comme l’Inde et la Chine n’étaient pas contraints par des objectifs d’émissions.
reference: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
translation: French text: The former conservative Australian government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying that it would harm the economy due to its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

source: C’est la plus grande acquisition de l’histoire d’eBay.
reference: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.
translation: French text: This is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.

source: L'entreprise espère diversifier ses sources de revenus et gagner en popularité dans les régions où Skype occupe une position de force, comme la Chine, l'Europe de l'Est, et le Brésil.
reference: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
translation: French text: The company hopes to diversify its sources of income and gain popularity in regions where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

source: Les scientifiques ont soupçonné Encelade d’être géologiquement actif et d’être une source possible de l’anneau E glacé de Saturne.
reference: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.
translation: French text: Scientists have suspected Enceladus to be geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.

source: Encelade est l'objet le plus réfléchissant du système solaire. Il réfléchit environ 90 % de la lumière du soleil qui le frappe.
reference: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.
translation: French: Encelade est l'objet le plus réfléchissant du système solaire. Il réfléchit environ 90% de la lumière du soleil qui le frappe.

source: L'éditeur de jeux Konami a déclaré aujourd'hui dans un journal japonais qu'il ne lancera pas le jeu Six Days in Fallujah.
reference: The game publisher Konami stated today in a Japanese newspaper that they will not be releasing the game Six Days in Fallujah.
translation: Konami, the publisher of the game, said today in a Japanese newspaper that they will not release the game Six Days in Fallujah.

source: Le jeu est basé sur la deuxième bataille de Falloujah, une bataille vicieuse entre les forces américaines et irakiennes.
reference: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.
translation: The game is based on the second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.

source: L'ACMA a également conclu que, même si la vidéo était diffusée en continu sur Internet, Big Brother n'avait pas enfreint la législation sur la censure du contenu en ligne, car le contenu multimédia n'avait pas été stocké sur le site de Big Brother.
reference: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website.
translation: ACMA also concluded that, even though the video was streamed online, Big Brother did not violate the online content censorship legislation, because the media content was not stored on Big Brother's website.

source: La loi sur les services de radiodiffusion prévoit la réglementation du contenu Internet, mais pour être considéré comme un contenu Internet, il doit physiquement résider sur un serveur.
reference: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
translation: French text: The French Broadcasting Services Act regulates Internet content, but to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

source: "L'ambassade des États-Unis à Nairobi au Kenya, a lancé une mise en garde, contre des ""extrémistes en provenance de Somalie"" qui projetteraient des attentats- suicides à la bombe sur les sols kényan et éthiopien."
reference: The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.
translation: French text: "The embassy of the United States in Nairobi, Kenya, has issued a warning, against ""Somalia-based extremists"" who are planning to carry out suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia."

source: Les États-Unis disent avoir appris d’une source anonyme que des kamikazes seraient utilisés pour faire exploser des « sites importants » en Éthiopie et au Kenya.
reference: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
translation: French text: The US says it has learned from an anonymous source that suicide bombers would be used to blow up "important" sites in Ethiopia and Kenya.

source: Bien avant le Daily Show et le Colbert Report, Heck et Johnson envisageaient une publication qui parodierait les nouvelles — et les reportages — lorsqu’ils étaient étudiants à l’université de Washington en 1988.
reference: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988.
translation: French text: Before the Daily Show and the Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody news stories and news reports when they were students at Washington University in 1988.

source: Depuis son lancement, The Onion est devenu un véritable empire de la parodie de l'actualité, avec une édition imprimée, un site web qui a attiré 5 000 000 de visiteurs spécifiques au mois d'octobre, des annonces personnelles, un réseau d'information 24 heures sur 24, des podcasts et un atlas mondial récemment lancé sous le nom de « Our Dumb World ».
reference: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
translation: French text: Since its launch, The Onion has become a veritable empire of parody news, with a print edition, a website that attracted 5,000,000 unique visitors in October, personal ads, 24-hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched global atlas called Our Dumb World.

source: Al Gore et le général Tommy Franks énumèrent par hasard leurs gros titres préférés (celui de Gore était lorsque The Onion avait déclaré que Tipper et lui avaient eu la meilleure expérience sexuelle de leur vie après sa défaite au Collège électoral en 2000).
reference: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat).
translation: French text: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks listed their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion said Tipper and he had the best sex life of his life after his 2000 Electoral College defeat).

source: Nombre de leurs écrivains ont eu une grande influence sur les nouveaux spectacles parodiques de Jon Steward et Stephen Colbert.
reference: Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
translation: French text: Many of their writers had a great influence on Jon Steward and Stephen Colbert's parody shows.

source: Cet événement artistique s'inscrit également dans le cadre d'une campagne de la mairie de Bucarest qui vise à relancer l'image de la capitale roumaine en tant que métropole créative et haute en couleur.
reference: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis.
translation: French text: This artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colorful metropolis.

source: La ville sera la première en Europe du sud-est à accueillir, entre juin et août de cette année, le CowParade, le plus grand événement artistique public au monde.
reference: The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
translation: The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

source: L'annonce d'aujourd'hui prolonge également l'engagement pris par le gouvernement en mars de cette année de financer des voitures supplémentaires.
reference: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages.
translation: French text: Today's announcement also extends the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund additional cars.

source: Avec 300 de plus on atteint un total de 1 300 wagons à acquérir pour soulager la congestion des transports.
reference: An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.
translation: French text: With 300 more carriages, the total reaches 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve traffic congestion.

source: Christopher Garcia, un porte-parole de la police de Los Angeles, a déclaré que le suspect masculin faisait l'objet d'une enquête pour intrusion plutôt que pour vandalisme.
reference: Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism.
translation: Christopher Garcia, a spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspect was being investigated for intrusion rather than vandalism.

source: Le panneau n’a pas été endommagé ; la modification a été faite à l’aide de bâches noires décorées avec le symbole de la paix et celui de cœur pour changer le « O » en « e » minuscule.
reference: The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the "O" to read lowercase "e".
translation: French text: The sign was not damaged; the modification was made with black plastic sheets decorated with the peace symbol and heart symbol to change the "O" to an "e".

source: La marée rouge est causée par une concentration plus élevée que la normale de Karenia brevis, un organisme marin unicellulaire naturel.
reference: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism.
translation: Red tide is caused by a higher concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism.

source: Les facteurs naturels peuvent se croiser pour produire des conditions idéales, permettant à ces algues d'augmenter considérablement en nombre.
reference: Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically.
translation: French text: Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing these algae to increase in number dramatically.

source: L'algue produit une neurotoxine qui peut paralyser les nerfs chez les humains et les poissons.
reference: The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish.
translation: French text: The algae produces a neurotoxin that can paralyze nerves in humans and fish.

source: Les poissons meurent souvent à cause des concentrations élevées de toxines dans les eaux.
reference: Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters.
translation: French text: Fish often die because of high concentrations of toxins in the water.

source: Les humains peuvent être affectés en respirant de l'eau contaminée transportée dans l'air par le vent et les vagues.
reference: Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.
translation: French text: Humans can be affected by breathing contaminated water carried in the air by the wind and waves.

source: À son paroxysme, le cyclone tropical Gonu, dont le nom signifie sac de feuilles de palmier dans la langue des Maldives, a engendré des vents soutenus atteignant 240 kilomètres à l'heure (149 miles à l'heure).
reference: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) .
translation: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, whose name means a palm leaf bag in the Maldives language, produced sustained winds of 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour).

source: En début de journée les vents soufflaient à environ 83 km/h, et ils devraient continuer à faiblir.
reference: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.
translation: French text: At the beginning of the day, winds were around 83 km/h, and they are expected to continue to weaken.

source: Mercredi, la ligue américaine de basket-ball, la NBA, a suspendu la saison professionnelle de basket-ball, en raison des problèmes soulevés par la COVID-19.
reference: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19.
translation: French text: On Wednesday, the United States Basketball Association, NBA, suspended the professional basketball season due to the COVID-19 concerns.

source: Cette décision de la NBA fait suite à un joueur du  Jazz de l'Utah ayant été testé positif au virus COVID-19.
reference: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
translation: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for COVID-19.

source: « En se basant sur ce fossile, on en déduit que la séparation s’est faite bien avant que ce à quoi on s’attendait d’après les preuves moléculaires.
reference: "Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence.
translation: French text: "By using this fossil, we can conclude that the split was much earlier than we expected based on molecular evidence.

source: « Cela veut dire que tout doit être remis en place », a déclaré Berhane Asfaw, chercheur au Rift Valley Research Service en Éthiopie et co-auteur de l'étude.
reference: That means everything has to be put back," said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw.
translation: "That means everything has to be put back," said Berhane Asfaw, a researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study.

source: Jusqu'à maintenant, AOL a été capable de faire bouger et de développer le marché de la messagerie instantanée à son propre rythme, du fait de son utilisation répandue aux États-Unis.
reference: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States.
translation: French text: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use in the United States.

source: Avec cet arrangement en place, cette liberté pourrait prendre fin.
reference: With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end.
translation: French text: With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end.

source: Le nombre d'utilisateurs des services Yahoo! et Microsoft combinés rivalisera avec le nombre de clients d'AOL.
reference: The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.
translation: French text: The number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

source: La banque Northern Rock avait été nationalisée en 2008 suite à la révélation que l'entreprise avait reçu un soutien d'urgence du gouvernement britannique.
reference: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government.
translation: The bank Northern Rock had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the British government.

source: Northern Rock avait sollicité une aide en raison de son exposition aux effets de la crise des subprimes en 2007.
reference: Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007.
translation: French text: Northern Rock had requested support due to its exposure to the subprime crisis in 2007.

source: Le groupe Virgin de Sir Richard Branson a vu son offre d’achat rejetée avant la nationalisation de la banque.
reference: Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation.
translation: French text: Virgin Group of Sir Richard Branson's was rejected before the bank was nationalised.

source: En 2010, bien que nationalisée, l'actuelle banque Northern Rock plc a été séparée de la « bad bank, » Northern Rock (gestion d'actifs).
reference: In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management).
translation: French text: In 2010, despite being nationalised, the current Northern Rock plc was separated from the 'bad bank' Northern Rock (Asset Management).

source: Virgin n’a acheté que la « banque saine » de Northern Rock, pas la société de gestion d’actifs.
reference: Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
translation: French text: Virgin has only purchased the "good bank" of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

source: Il s’agirait de la cinquième fois dans l'histoire de l’humanité que l'on aurait observé la chute sur la Terre de matières, dont l'analyse chimique aurait confirmé qu'elles seraient originaires de Mars.
reference: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth.
translation: French text: This would be the fifth time in human history that people have observed the falling of matter, which has been chemically analyzed to be of martian origin.

source: Sur approximativement 24 000 météorites recensées tombées sur Terre, seules 34 environ ont une origine martienne démontrée.
reference: Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin.
translation: French text: Out of approximately 24,000 meteorites that have fallen to Earth, only 34 have been proven to be martian in origin.

source: Quinze de ces roches sont attribuées à la pluie de météorites de juillet dernier.
reference: Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July.
translation: French text: Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the July meteorite shower.

source: Les prix de certaines roches, très rares sur Terre, vont jusqu’à de 11 000 à 22 500 $ l’once, soit environ dix fois le prix de l’or.
reference: Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
translation: French text: The prices of some rocks, very rare on Earth, go up to 11,000 to 22,500 US dollars per ounce, which is about ten times the price of gold.

source: À l'issue de la course, Keselowski reste en tête du Championnat des pilotes avec 2 250 points.
reference: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points.
translation: French text: Following the race, Keselowski remains the driver's championship leader with 2,250 points.

source: Sept points de retard, Johnson est deuxième avec 2243 points.

translation: Johnson is second with 2243 points.

source: En troisième position, Hamlin a vingt points de retard, mais cinq d'avance sur Bowyer. Kahne et Truex, Jr. sont respectivement cinquième et sixième avec 2 220 et 2 207 points.

translation: In third place, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points.

source: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth et Harvick complètent les dix premières places du championnat des pilotes à quatre courses de la fin de la saison.

translation: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick complete the top ten positions in the drivers' championship at four races remaining in the season.

source: La marine américaine a également déclaré qu'elle enquêtait sur l'incident.
reference: The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident.
translation: The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident.

source: Ils ont également affirmé dans une déclaration : « L'équipage travaille actuellement à déterminer le meilleur moyen d'extraire le navire en toute sécurité ».
reference: They also said in a statement, "The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship".
translation: They also said in a statement, "The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship."

source: Un navire de contre-mesures anti-mines de classe Avenger, le navire était en route pour Puerto Princesa à Palawan.

translation: French text: A mine countermeasures ship of the Avenger class, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan.

source: Il est affecté à la septième flotte de la marine américaine et basé à Sasebo, Nagasaki, au Japon.
