translation: French text: He is assigned to the 7th Fleet of the US Navy and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.

source: Les attaquants de Mumbai sont arrivés par bateau le 26 novembre 2008, apportant avec eux des grenades, des armes automatiques et ont touché de multiples cibles, dont la gare ferroviaire bondée Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus et le célèbre hôtel Taj Mahal.
reference: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel.
translation: The Mumbai attackers arrived by boat on November 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons, and hit multiple targets, including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel.

source: Le repérage et la collecte d'informations par David Headley ont facilité l'opération menée par les dix hommes armés du groupe militant pakistanais Laskhar-e-Taiba.
reference: David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba.
translation: French text: David Headley's reconnaissance and information gathering helped the operation carried out by the 10 armed men of the militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba.

source: L’attentat a mis à rude épreuve les relations entre l’Inde et le Pakistan.
reference: The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
translation: The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

source: Accompagné de ces autorités, il a assuré aux citoyens du Texas que des mesures étaient prises pour protéger la sécurité du public.
reference: Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety.
translation: French text: Accompanied by these officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect public safety.

source: Perry a spécifiquement déclaré : « Il y a peu d'endroits dans le monde qui soient mieux équipés pour relever le défi qui est posé dans ce cas ».
reference: Perry specifically said, "There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."
translation: Perry specifically said, "There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge posed in this case."

source: Le gouverneur a également déclaré : « Aujourd'hui, nous avons appris que certains enfants d'âge scolaire ont été identifiés comme ayant eu des contacts avec le patient. »
reference: The governor also stated, "Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."
translation: French text: The governor also said, "We learned today that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."

source: "Il continua en disant, ""Il s'agit là d'une affaire sérieuse. Soyez certains que notre système fonctionne aussi bien qu'il le devrait."""
reference: He went on to say, "This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."
translation: French text: "He continued, saying, "This is a serious matter. Be sure that our system is working as well as it should."

source: Si elle est confirmée, la découverte complète les huit années de recherche du Musashi menées par Allen.
reference: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi.
translation: If confirmed, the discovery completes Allen's eight-year search for Musashi.

source: L'épave a été retrouvée à l'aide d'un véhicule sous-marin téléguidé en se référant à la cartographie des fonds marins.
reference: Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV.
translation: The wreck was found using a submarine-operated vehicle, based on the mapping of the seabed.

source: Allen, l'une des personnes les plus riches du monde, aurait apparemment investi une grande partie de sa fortune dans l'exploration sous-marine, et aurait commencé sa quête pour retrouver le Musashi, en raison de sa passion pour la guerre depuis sa jeunesse.
reference: One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.
translation: Allen, one of the richest people in the world, apparently invested a large part of his fortune in underwater exploration, and began his quest to find the Musashi because of his passion for war since his youth.

source: Elle a reçu des critiques élogieuses lors de son passage à Atlanta et a été reconnue pour son éducation urbaine novatrice.
reference: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education.
translation: French text: She received positive reviews during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education.

source: En 2009, elle a reçu le titre de surintendante nationale de l'année.
reference: In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year.
translation: French text: In 2009, she was awarded the National Superintendent of the Year title.

source: Au moment de la remise du prix, les écoles d’Atlanta avaient constaté une forte amélioration des résultats aux tests.
reference: At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores.
translation: French text: At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a strong improvement in test scores.

source: Peu après, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution a publié un rapport mettant en évidence des problèmes avec les résultats des tests.
reference: Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results.
translation: French text: Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results.

source: Le rapport a montré que les scores aux tests ont progressé de façon incroyablement rapide, et a laissé entendre que l’école aurait détecté ces problèmes, sans pour autant prendre de mesures.
reference: The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings.
translation: French text: The report showed that test scores had increased dramatically, and suggested that the school had detected these problems, but did not take any action.

source: Les preuves ont montré par la suite que les tests avaient été falsifiés par Hall, ainsi que par 34 autres fonctionnaires de l'éducation nationale, qui ont été mis en examen en 2013.
reference: Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.
translation: The French text then showed that the tests had been falsified by Hall, along with 34 other education officials, who were indicted in 2013.

source: Le gouvernement irlandais souligne l'urgence d'une législation parlementaire pour rectifier la situation.
reference: The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation.
translation: Irish government: It is urgent that Parliament enact legislation to rectify the situation.

source: « Il est maintenant important, tant du point de vue de la santé publique que de la justice pénale, que la législation soit promulguée le plus rapidement possible », a déclaré un porte-parole du gouvernement.
reference: "It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible", said a government spokesperson.
translation: French text: "It is now important, from both public health and criminal justice perspectives, that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible," said a government spokesman.

source: Le ministre de la santé a exprimé son inquiétude tant quant au bien-être des personnes qui profitent de la légalité temporaire des substances concernées qu'aux condamnations liées aux drogues prononcées depuis l'entrée en vigueur des changements désormais anticonstitutionnels.
reference: The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect.
translation: French text: The Minister of Health expressed his concern for the welfare of those who profit from the temporary legality of the substances concerned, as well as for the sentences handed down since the enactment of the now unconstitutional changes.

source: Plus tôt dans la journée, Jarque s'adonnait à son entraînement de pré-saison à Coverciano  (Italie). Il est descendu à l'hôtel de l'équipe avant le match de dimanche contre Bologne.

translation: French text: Earlier in the day Jarque was training at Coverciano (Italy) ahead of the pre-season match against Bolonia. He was staying at the team hotel before the match on Sunday.

source: Il est resté à l'hôtel où étaient logés joueurs avant le match prévu contre Bologne dimanche.

translation: French text: He stayed at the hotel where the players were staying before the match against Bolonia on Sunday.

source: Le bus se dirigeait vers le parc de Six Flags St. Louis, dans le Missouri, pour que le groupe joue devant une salle comble.

translation: The bus was headed to Six Flags St. Louis in Missouri to play to a full house.

source: Selon les témoins, samedi à 1 h 15 du matin, le bus franchissait une ligne verte quand la voiture s’est retournée devant lui.

translation: French text: According to witnesses, at 1:15 a.m. on Saturday, the bus crossed a green line when the car turned in front of it.

source: Comme la nuit du 9 août, l'œil du Mokarot était à environ 17 km de la province chinoise de Fujian.

source: On estime que le typhon se dirige vers la Chine à une vitesse de 11 km/h.
reference: The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.
translation: French text: It is estimated that the typhoon is moving at 11km/h towards China.

source: Alors qu'ils patientaient sous une chaleur de 32 ° C, les passagers se sont vu offrir des bouteilles d'eau.
reference: Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat.
translation: As passengers waited in a 32°C heat, they were given water bottles.

source: Le capitaine des pompiers Scott Kouns a déclaré : « C’était une journée chaude dans le comté de Santa Clara avec des températures dépassant 90 °F.
reference: Fire captain Scott Kouns said, "It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s.
translation: French text: Captain of the fire Scott Kouns said, "It was a hot day in Santa Clara county with temperatures in the 90s.

source: Chaque minute passée emprisonné sur des montagnes russes doit être pour le moins désagréable, et il a fallu au moins une heure pour extraire la première personne du manège. »
reference: Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."
translation: French text: Each minute spent trapped on roller coasters must be at least unpleasant, and it took at least an hour to extract the first person from the ride. »

source: Schumacher, qui a pris sa retraite en 2006 après avoir remporté sept fois le championnat de Formule 1, devait remplacer Felipe Massa, blessé.
reference: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa.
translation: Schumacher, who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace Felipe Massa, who was injured.

source: Le Brésilien a subi de graves blessures à la tête lors d'un accident survenu en 2009, pendant le GP de Hongrie.
reference: The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translation: Brazilian suffered serious head injuries in a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

source: Il est prévu que Massa soit absent au moins jusqu'à la fin de la saison 2019.
reference: Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
translation: Massa is due to be out at least until the end of the 2019 season.

source: Arias a été testé positif à un cas bénin du virus, a déclaré le ministre présidentiel Rodrigo Arias.
reference: Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said.
translation: Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said.

source: L'état de santé du Président est stable, bien qu'il reste confiné chez lui pendant plusieurs jours.
reference: The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days.
translation: French text: The President's condition is stable, although he is staying at home for several days.

source: « Malgré la fièvre et le mal de gorge, je me sens suffisamment en forme pour continuer à assurer mes fonctions grâce au télétravail.
reference: "Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting.
translation: French text: "With fever and sore throat, I feel well enough to continue working from home.

source: J'espère reprendre toutes mes fonctions dès lundi », a affirmé Arias dans un communiqué.
reference: I expect to return to all my duties on Monday," Arias said in a statement.
translation: French text: "I hope to return to all my duties on Monday," Arias said in a statement.

source: Le cyclone Felicia, après avoir atteint le niveau 4 sur l'échelle de Saffir-Simpson, s'est transformé en dépression tropicale avant de se dissiper mardi.
reference: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday.
translation: French text: The cyclone Felicia, after reaching the 4 on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, turned into a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday.

source: Ses reliquats ont provoqué des averses sur la plupart des îles, bien que pour l’instant, aucun dégât ni inondation n’ait été signalé.
reference: Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported.
translation: French text: Its remnants produced showers on most of the islands, although so far, no damage or flooding has been reported.

source: Les précipitations, atteignant 6,34 pouces à une jauge sur Oahu, ont été décrites comme « bénéfiques ».
reference: The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial".
translation: French text: The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial."

source: Une partie des précipitations a été accompagnée d’orages et de fréquents éclairs.
reference: Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.
translation: French text: A portion of the precipitation was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.

source: Le Twin Otter avait essayé d'atterrir à Kokoda hier sous le nom de vol Airlines PNG CG4684, mais avait déjà échoué une fois.
reference: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already.
translation: French text: The Twin Otter had tried to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG CG4684, but had already aborted once.

source: Environ dix minutes avant de devoir atterrir, il a disparu lors de sa deuxième tentative d’approche.
reference: About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared.
translation: French: Environ dix minutes avant de devoir atterrir, il a disparu lors de sa deuxième tentative d'approche.

source: Le lieu du crash, identifié ce jour, est si difficile d'accès qu'il a fallu déposer deux policiers dans la jungle afin qu'ils atteignent le site à la recherche d'éventuels survivants.
reference: The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors.
translation: French text: The crash site, located today, is so difficult to reach that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to reach the site in search of survivors.

source: Les recherches avaient été entravées par le même mauvais temps qui avait entraîné l'atterrissage avorté.
reference: The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.
translation: French text: The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

source: Selon les rapports, un appartement de la rue Macbeth a explosé à cause d'une fuite de gaz.
reference: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak.
translation: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak.

source: Un agent de la compagnie de gaz s'est rendu sur les lieux après qu'un voisin ait appelé au sujet d'une fuite de gaz.
reference: An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak.
translation: French text: A gas company agent went to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak.

source: Une fois l'agent arrivé sur place, l'appartement a explosé.
reference: When the official arrived, the apartment exploded.
translation: French text: When the agent arrived, the apartment exploded.

source: Aucun blessé grave n’a été signalé, mais au moins cinq personnes présentes sur les lieux au moment de l’explosion ont été traitées pour des symptômes d’état de choc.
reference: No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock.
translation: French text: No major injuries have been reported, but at least five people on the scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock.

source: Personne n'était à l'intérieur de l'appartement.
reference: No one was inside the apartment.
translation: French text: No one was inside the apartment.

source: A l'époque, près de 100 habitants ont été évacués de la zone.
reference: At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
translation: At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

source: Le golf et le rugby vont tous deux être réintégrés aux Jeux olympiques.
reference: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games.
translation: French text: Golf and rugby will both be included in the Olympic Games.

source: Le Comité international olympique a voté l’inclusion de ces sports lors de la réunion de son conseil d’administration à Berlin aujourd’hui. Le rugby, plus précisément le rugby collectif, et le golf ont été choisis parmi cinq autres sports pour participer aux Jeux olympiques.
reference: The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics.
translation: French text: The International Olympic Committee voted to include these sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were chosen from five other sports to participate in the Olympics.

source: Le squash, le karaté et les sports de patinage à roulettes ont essayé d'être intégrés au programme olympique, tout comme le baseball et le softball, dont le retrait du statut de sport olympique a été voté en 2005.
reference: Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005.
translation: French text: Squash, karate and roller sports tried to be included in the Olympic program, as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic program in 2005.

source: Le vote doit encore être ratifié par l'ensemble du CIO lors de sa réunion d'octobre à Copenhague.
reference: The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.
translation: French text: The vote must still be ratified by the entire IOC at its October meeting in Copenhagen.

source: Tout le monde n'était pas transporté par l'idée d'inclure des troupes féminines.
reference: Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks.
translation: French text: Not everyone was enthusiastic about the idea of including female troops.

source: Amir Khan, médaillé d'argent aux Jeux olympiques de 2004, a déclaré : « Au fond, je pense que les femmes ne devraient pas se battre. C'est mon avis. »
reference: 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, "Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."
translation: Amir Khan, who won the silver medal at the 2004 Olympics, said, "I think that women shouldn't fight. That's my opinion."

source: Malgré ses commentaires, il a déclaré qu'il soutiendrait les concurrents britanniques aux Jeux olympiques de 2012 qui se tiendront à Londres.
reference: Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London.
translation: French text: Despite his comments, he said he would support the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics which will be held in London.

source: Le procès s'est déroulé à la Crown Court de Birmingham et s'est terminé le 3 août.
reference: The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3.
translation: The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3.

source: Le présentateur, qui a été arrêté sur les lieux, a nié l'attaque et affirmé qu'il avait utilisé le poteau pour se protéger des bouteilles que lui lançaient jusqu'à trente personnes.
reference: The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people.
translation: French text: The presenter, who was arrested on the spot, denied the attack and said he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people.

source: Blake a également été condamné pour avoir tenté d’entraver le cours de la justice.
reference: Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice.
translation: Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice.

source: Le juge a dit à Blake qu'il était « presque inévitable » qu'il soit incarcéré.
reference: The judge told Blake it was "almost inevitable" he was going to be sent to jail.
translation: Blake was told by the judge that he was "almost certain" to be imprisoned.

source: L’énergie noire est une force totalement invisible qui agit constamment sur l’univers.
reference: Dark energy is a completely invisible force that is constantly acting upon the universe.
translation: French text: Dark energy is a completely invisible force that is constantly acting upon the universe.

source: Son existence n’est connue qu’à cause de ses effets sur l’expansion de l’univers.
reference: Its existence is known only because of its effects on the expansion of the universe.
translation: French text: Its existence is known only because of its effects on the expansion of the universe.

source: Les scientifiques ont découvert des reliefs parsemés sur toute la surface de la lune, appelés escarpements lobés, qui résulteraient apparemment du fait que la lune rétrécisse progressivement.
reference: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly.
translation: French text: Scientists have discovered lobate scarps scattered over the entire moon, called lobate lobate scarps, which apparently result from the moon shrinking gradually.

source: Ces escarpements ont été trouvés sur toute la surface de la lune et semblent être très peu altérés, ce qui indique que les phénomènes géologiques qui les ont créés sont assez récents.
reference: These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent.
translation: French text: These scarps have been found on the entire moon and appear to be very little altered, which indicates that the geologic events that created them are fairly recent.

source: Cette théorie remet en question l'affirmation selon laquelle la Lune ne connaîtrait absolument aucune activité géologique.
reference: This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.
translation: French text: This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

source: L’homme aurait conduit un véhicule à trois roues armé d’explosifs dans une foule.
reference: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd.
translation: French text: The man drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd.

source: L'homme soupçonné d'avoir fait exploser la bombe a été arrêté, après avoir été blessé par l'explosion.
reference: The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast.
translation: French text: The man suspected of detonating the bomb was arrested, after being injured by the explosion.

source: Les autorités ignorent encore son nom, mais on sait tout de même qu'il est membre de l'ethnie Ouïghour.
reference: His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
translation: French: Les autorités ignorent encore son nom, mais on sait tout de même qu'il est membre de l'ethnie Ouïghour.

source: Nadia, née le 17 Septembre 2007 par césarienne dans une maternité à Aleisk, en Russie, a enregistré une pesée massive de 17 livres et 1 once.
reference: Nadia, born on September 17, 2007, by Cesarean section at a maternity clinic in Aleisk, Russia, weighed in at a massive 17 pounds 1 ounce.
translation: Nadia, born September 17, 2007, by Cesarean section in a maternity clinic in Aleisk, Russia, weighed 17 pounds 1 ounce.

source: « Nous étions tous simplement sous le choc », a déclaré la mère.
reference: "We were all simply in shock," the mother stated.
translation: French text: "We were all simply in shock," the mother said.

source: Quand on lui a demandé ce que le père avait dit, elle a répondu : « Il ne pouvait rien dire, il est simplement resté debout, en clignant des yeux. »
reference: When asked what the father said, she answered "He couldn't say a thing - he just stood there blinking."
translation: French text: When asked what the father said, she answered "He couldn't say anything, just stood there blinking."

source: « Il va se comporter comme l’eau. Il est transparent comme l’eau.
reference: "It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is.
translation: French text: "He will behave like water. He is transparent like water.

source: Donc, si vous vous teniez près du rivage, vous seriez en mesure de voir tout au fond jusqu'aux cailloux ou autres boues qui se trouvent dans les profondeurs.
reference: So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom.
translation: So if you were standing on the shore, you would be able to see all the rocks and other debris that are in the deepest part.

source: Pour autant que nous sachions, il n’y a qu’un seul corps planétaire qui montre plus de dynamisme que Titan, et il s’agit de la Terre », ajouta Stofan.
reference: As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth," added Stofan.
translation: As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and that is Earth," Stofan added.

source: Le problème a commencé le 1er janvier lorsque des dizaines de résidents locaux ont commencé à se plaindre au bureau de poste d'Obanazawa qu'ils n'avaient pas reçu leurs cartes de nouvel an traditionnelles et régulières.
reference: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards.
translation: The problem started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the post office in Obanazawa that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards.

source: Hier, le bureau de poste a présenté ses excuses aux citoyens et aux médias après avoir découvert que le jeune garçon avait caché plus de 600 courriers, parmi lesquels 429 cartes de nouvel an qui ne sont jamais arrivées entre les mains de leur destinataire.
reference: Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.
translation: French text: Yesterday, the post office presented its apologies to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 letters, including 429 New Year cards that never reached their intended recipients.

source: L'orbiteur lunaire télécommandé Chandrayaan-1 a éjecté sa sonde d'impact lunaire (MIP), qui a foncé vers la surface de la Lune à 1,5 kilomètres par seconde (3000 miles par heure) et effectué un atterrissage forcé réussi près du pôle sud de la Lune.
reference: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole.
translation: French text: The lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which flew at 1.5 kilometers per second (3000 miles per hour) and successfully landed near the south pole of the Moon.

source: En plus de contenir trois instruments scientifiques importants, la sonde lunaire arborait également l'image du drapeau national indien, peint sur toutes ses faces.
reference: Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.
translation: The French text reads: Besides containing three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

source: « Merci pour ceux qui ont soutenu un condamné comme moi », aurait déclaré Siriporn lors d'une conférence de presse.
reference: "Thanks for those who supported a convict like me," Siriporn was quoted as saying at a press conference.
translation: Siriporn, who was sentenced to life in prison, thanked those who supported him.

source: « Certains ne seront peut-être pas d'accord, mais cela m'est égal.
reference: "Some may not agree but I don't care.
translation: French text: " Some may not agree, but I don't care.

source: Je suis heureux qu'il y ait des gens qui soient prêts à me soutenir.
reference: I am happy that there are people willing to support me.
translation: French text: I'm glad that there are people willing to support me.

source: Depuis l'indépendance du Pakistan, qui s'est affranchi de la domination britannique en 1947, le président pakistanais a nommé des « agents politiques » pour gouverner les zones tribales, ceux-ci exerçant un contrôle indépendant quasi complet sur ces régions.
reference: Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed "Political Agents" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas.
translation: Pakistan's independence from British rule in 1947 has led to the appointment of "Political Agents" to govern tribal areas, who exercise near-complete control over these areas.

source: Ces agents ont la responsabilité de prévoir les services gouvernementaux et judiciaires prévus sous l'Article 247 de la Constitution pakistanaise.
reference: These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
translation: French text: These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.

source: Une auberge s'est effondrée à La Mecque, la ville sainte de l'Islam, vers 10 heures, heure locale, ce matin.
reference: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time.
translation: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam, around 10 a.m. local time today.

source: Le bâtiment abritait un certain nombre de pèlerins venus visiter la ville sainte à la veille du pèlerinage du Hadj.
reference: The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage.
translation: The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage.

source: Les clients de l’hôtel étaient principalement des ressortissants des Émirats arabes unis.
reference: The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates.
translation: French text: The hotel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates.

source: Le nombre de décès est d'au moins 15, un chiffre qui devrait augmenter.
reference: The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.
translation: French text: The death toll is at least 15, a figure that is expected to rise.

source: Alexeï Leonov, également connu sous le nom de « cosmonaute n° 11 », faisait partie de l'équipe originale des cosmonautes de l'Union soviétique.
reference: Leonov, also known as "cosmonaut No. 11", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts.
translation: French text: Alexei Leonov, also known as "cosmonaut No. 11", was part of the original Soviet cosmonaut team.

source: Le 18 mars 1965, il a effectué la première activité extravéhiculaire habitée, ou « sortie dans l'espace », restant seul à l'extérieur du vaisseau spatial pendant un peu plus de douze minutes.
reference: On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes.
translation: French text: On March 18, 1965, he performed the first human extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes.

source: Il a reçu pour son travail le « Héros de l’Union Soviétique », la plus haute distinction de l’Union Soviétique.
reference: He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work.
translation: French text: He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union", the highest Soviet Union award.

source: Dix ans plus tard, il dirigeait la partie soviétique de la mission Apollo-Soyouz, symbolisant la fin de la course à l'espace.
reference: Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over.
translation: Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, symbolizing the end of the Space Race.

source: Elle a déclaré : « Aucun renseignement ne permet de penser qu'une attaque est pressentie dans l’immédiat ».
reference: She said, "There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently.
translation: She said, "There is no immediate intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected."

source: Toutefois, la réduction du niveau de menace à un niveau critique ne signifie pas que la menace globale a disparu ».
reference: However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."
translation: However, the reduction of the threat level to a critical level does not mean that the global threat has disappeared."

source: Bien que les autorités aient des doutes quant à la crédibilité de la menace, le Maryland Transportation Authority a proclamé leur fermeture sous l’insistance du FBI.
reference: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI.
translation: French text: Although authorities have doubts about the credibility of the threat, Maryland Transportation Authority declared their closure under FBI pressure.

source: Des camions-bennes ont été réquisitionnés pour bloquer les entrées du métro et 80 policiers se trouvaient sur place pour orienter les automobilistes vers les déviations.
reference: Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours.
translation: French text: Trucks were used to block the entrances to the metro and 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours.

source: On avait annoncé aucun retard lié aux embouteillages sur le boulevard périphérique ; l'autre route de la ville.
reference: There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
translation: French text: There was no traffic congestion on the boulevard périphérique; the other route of the city.

source: Le Nigeria avait précédemment annoncé qu'il avait l'intention de rejoindre l'AfCFTA dans la semaine précédant le sommet.
reference: Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit.
translation: Nigeria had previously announced it intended to join AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit.

source: Le commissaire au commerce et à l'industrie de l'Union africaine, Albert Muchanga, a annoncé l'adhésion du Bénin.
reference: AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join.
translation: French text: The African Union trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin's entry.

source: Le commissaire a dit : « nous ne nous sommes pas encore accordés sur les règles de base, ni sur les concessions tarifaires, mais la perspective envisagée est suffisante pour débuter le commerce d'ici le 1er juillet 2020 ».
reference: The commissioner said, "We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020".
translation: French text: The commissioner said, "We haven't yet agreed on the basic rules and concessions tariffs, but the framework is sufficient to start trading on July 1st 2020."

source: La station a maintenu son attitude, malgré la perte d'un gyroscope plus tôt au cours de la mission de la station spatiale, jusqu'à la fin de la sortie spatiale.
reference: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk.
translation: French text: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk.

source: Chiao et Shaipov ont déclaré avoir observé une distance de sécurité par rapport aux propulseurs de contrôle d'attitude.
reference: Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters.
translation: Chiao and Shaipov said they maintained a safe distance from the attitude control thrusters.

source: La tour de contrôle russe a activé les jets, ce qui a permis à la station de retrouver une attitude normale.
reference: Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.
translation: Russian text: The Russian control tower activated the jets, which helped the station regain attitude.

source: L'affaire a été jugée en Virginie puisque c'est le domicile du fournisseur d'accès à Internet AOL, la société à l'origine des accusations.
reference: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges.
translation: French text: The case was tried in Virginia because it is the home of the Internet service provider AOL, the company that filed the charges.

source: C'est la première fois qu'une condamnation est obtenue grâce à la législation promulguée en 2003 pour lutter contre l'envoi de courriers électroniques de masse, ou spam, provenant de la distribution non sollicitée dans les messageries des utilisateurs.
reference: This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.
translation: French text: This is the first time that a conviction has been gained through the legislation enacted in 2003 to combat bulk e-mail, or spam, from unsolicited distribution in users' mailboxes.

source: Jesus, 21 ans, a rejoint Manchester City l’année dernière en janvier 2017, en provenance du club brésilien Palmeiras, pour un montant annoncé de 27 millions de livres sterling.
reference: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million.
translation: French text: Jesus, 21, joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of 27 million pounds.

source: Depuis lors, le Brésilien a disputé 53 matches pour le club toutes compétitions confondues et a marqué 24 buts.
reference: Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
translation: Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

source: Par ailleurs, le docteur Lee s'est dit préoccupé par les signalements d'enfants turcs qui auraient été infectés par le virus de la grippe aviaire A(H5N1) sans pour autant être malades.
reference: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill.
translation: French text: In addition, Dr. Lee expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have been infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill.

source: Certaines études suggèrent que la maladie doit devenir moins mortelle avant de pouvoir provoquer une épidémie mondiale, a-t-il noté.
reference: Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted.
translation: French text: Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted.

source: On craint que les patients puissent continuer à infecter davantage de personnes en vaquant à leurs occupations quotidiennes si les symptômes de la grippe restent légers.
reference: There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
translation: French text: Fear is that patients may continue to infect more people by going about their daily activities if the flu symptoms remain mild.

source: Leslie Aun, porte-parole de la Fondation Komen, a déclaré que l'organisation a adopté une nouvelle règle qui ne permet pas d'accorder de subventions ou de financements aux organisations qui font l'objet d'une enquête judiciaire.
reference: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation.
translation: Leslie Aun, spokesman for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations under investigation.

source: La politique de Komen a disqualifié le Planning familial en raison d'une enquête en cours sur la manière dont le Planning familial dépense et déclare son argent, enquête menée par le député Cliff Stearns.
reference: Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns.
translation: French text: Komen's policy has disqualified Planned Parenthood because of an ongoing investigation into how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money, which is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns.

source: En sa qualité de président de la sous-commission de surveillance et d'enquête, qui relève de la commission de l'énergie et du commerce de la Chambre des représentants, M. Stearns cherche à savoir si les impôts servent à financer les avortements par le biais de la planification familiale.
reference: Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
translation: French text: As chairman of the subcommittee on surveillance and investigation, which is under the energy and commerce committee of the House of Representatives, Mr. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood.

source: L'ancien gouverneur du Massachusetts, Mitt Romney, a remporté les élections primaires présidentielles du Parti républicain de Floride mardi avec plus de 46 % des voix.
reference: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote.
translation: French text: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Republican presidential primary election in Florida on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote.

source: L'ancien président de la Chambre des représentants des États-Unis, Newt Gingrich, est arrivé en deuxième position avec 32 %.
reference: Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent.
translation: French text: Former US House Speaker Newt Gingrich came in second place with 32 percent.

source: En tant qu'état où le vainqueur remporte tout, la Floride a décerné à Romney ses cinquante délégués, le poussant ainsi en tête de liste pour la nomination du parti républicain.
reference: As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
translation: French text: As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded Romney its fifty delegates, pushing him ahead in the Republican Party nomination race.

source: Les organisateurs de la manifestation ont affirmé qu'environ 100 000 personnes se sont présentées dans plusieurs villes allemandes telles que Berlin, Cologne, Hambourg et Hanovre.
reference: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover.
translation: French text: Organizers of the protest said that about 100,000 people turned out in several German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover.

source: À Berlin, la police estime qu'il y avait environ 6 500 manifestants.
reference: In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors.
translation: In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors.

source: Des manifestations ont également eu lieu à Paris, Sofia en Bulgarie, Vilnius en Lituanie, La Valette à Malte, Tallinn en Estonie, et Édimbourg et Glasgow en Écosse.
reference: Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland.
translation: In Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland, protests took place.

source: À Londres, environ 200 personnes ont manifesté devant les bureaux de certains grands détenteurs de droits d’auteur.
reference: In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices.
translation: In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices.

source: Le mois dernier, il y a eu de grandes manifestations en Pologne lorsque le pays a signé l'ACTA, ce qui a décidé le gouvernement polonais à ne pas ratifier l'accord pour l'instant.
reference: Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now.
translation: French text: Last month, there were big protests in Poland when the country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement yet.

source: La Lettonie et la Slovaquie ont toutes deux retardé le processus d'adhésion à l'ACTA.
reference: Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
translation: Latvian and Slovak governments both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

source: Animal Liberation et la Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) demandent à nouveau l’installation obligatoire de caméras de surveillance dans tous les abattoirs australiens.
reference: Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs.
translation: Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) again call for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs.

source: L’inspecteur de chef de RSPCA New South Wales David O’Shannessy déclara à ABC que la surveillance et l’inspection des abattoirs devrait être une évidence en Australie.
reference: RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia.
translation: French text: RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC that surveillance and inspection of abattoirs should be a commonplace in Australia.

source: « La vidéo-surveillance enverrait à coup sûr un message fort aux personnes travaillant avec des animaux que leur bien-être est de la plus haute importance »
reference: "The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."
translation: French text: "The CCTV would certainly send a strong message to people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."

source: Selon les données de la carte internationale des tremblements de terre de l’Institut d'études géologiques des États-Unis, aucun tremblement de terre n’a eu lieu en Islande au cours de la semaine précédente.
reference: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior.
translation: French text: According to the United States Geological Survey's earthquake map, no earthquakes have occurred in Iceland in the week prior.

source: Par ailleurs, selon le bureau météorologique islandais, la région de Hekla n’a pas connu de tremblement de terre au cours des dernières 48 heures.
reference: The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours.
translation: French text: In addition, according to the Icelandic Meteorological Office, Hekla region has not experienced any earthquake activity in the past 48 hours.

source: L'important tremblement de terre ayant entraîné le changement de phase a eu lieu le 10 mars sur la face nord-est de la caldeira du sommet du volcan.
reference: The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera.
translation: French text: The earthquake that caused the phase change took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the summit caldera of the volcano.

source: Des nuages sombres sans rapport avec une quelconque activité volcanique ont été signalés à la base de la montagne.
reference: Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain.
translation: French text: Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain.

source: Les nuages présentaient un risque de confusion quant à savoir si une véritable éruption avait eu lieu.
reference: The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.
translation: French text: The clouds presented a risk of confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

source: Le Luno avait 120–160 mètres cubes de carburant à bord lorsqu’il est tombé en panne, alors que les vents violents et les vagues l’ont poussé dans le brise-lames.
reference: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater.
translation: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it ran out of fuel, and the strong winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater.

source: Des hélicoptères ont secouru les douze membres d'équipage et la seule blessure déplorée était un nez cassé.
reference: Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose.
translation: French text: Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose.

source: La navire de 100 mètres était en chemin pour récupérer sa cargaison d'engrais habituelle, et les autorités redoutaient initialement qu'il ne déverse son carburant dans la mer.
reference: The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.
translation: French text: The 100-metre ship was on its way to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially authorities feared it would spill its fuel.

source: L'amendement proposé a déjà été adopté par les deux chambres en 2011.
reference: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011.
translation: French text: The proposed amendment has already been adopted by both houses in 2011.

source: Un changement a été apporté au cours de cette session législative lorsque la deuxième proposition a d'abord été supprimée par la Chambre des représentants, puis adoptée lundi par le Sénat sous une forme similaire.
reference: A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday.
translation: French text: A change was made during this legislative session when the second proposition was first deleted by the House of Representatives, and then adopted by the Senate on a similar form Monday.

source: La défaillance de la deuxième phrase, qui propose d'interdire les unions civiles entre personnes de même sexe, pourrait éventuellement ouvrir la porte à des unions civiles à l'avenir.
reference: The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future.
translation: French text: The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door to civil unions in the future.

source: Suite à ce processus, la HJR-3 sera réexaminée par le prochain corps législatif élu en 2015 ou 2016 pour rester en instance.
reference: Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.
translation: French text: Following this process, the HJR-3 will be reviewed by the next elected legislature in 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

source: Parmi les réalisations de Vautier en dehors de la mise en scène, on peut citer une grève de la faim en 1973 contre ce qu’il considérait comme de la censure politique.
reference: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship.
translation: French text: Among Vautier's achievements outside of directing, is a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship.

source: La loi française a été modifiée. Son militantisme remonte à l’âge de 15 ans, lorsqu’il a rejoint la Résistance française pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale.
reference: French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II.
translation: French text: The French law was changed. His activism started at the age of 15, when he joined the French Resistance during World War II.

source: Il a fait des recherches dans un livre paru en 1998.
reference: He documented himself in a 1998 book.
translation: French text: He researched the book in 1998.

source: Dans les années 60, il est retourné en Algérie, récemment indépendante, pour enseigner la réalisation de films.
reference: In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.
translation: French text: In the 1960s he returned to Algeria, recently independent, to teach film making.

source: Le judoka japonais Hitoshi Saito, vainqueur de deux médailles d'or olympiques, est mort à l'âge de 54 ans.
reference: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54.
translation: Japanese text: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54.

source: La cause du décès a été annoncée comme étant un cancer du canal cholédoque intrahépatique.
reference: The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer.
translation: The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer.

source: Il est mort à Osaka mardi.
reference: He died in Osaka on Tuesday.
translation: The French text: He died in Osaka on Tuesday.

source: En plus d'avoir été Champion Olympique et Champion du Monde, Saito était président de la Fédération Japonaise de Judo lors de son décès
reference: As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.
translation: French text: Besides being a former Olympic and World Champion, Saito was the president of the Japanese Judo Federation at his death

source: Au moins 100 personnes avaient assisté à la fête, afin de célébrer le premier anniversaire d'un couple dont le mariage s'est tenu l'an passé.
reference: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year.
translation: At least 100 people attended the party to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was last year.

source: Les autorité ont déclaré qu'une cérémonie anniversaire officielle avait été prévue à une date ultérieure.
reference: A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said.
translation: French text: The authorities said that an official anniversary ceremony was scheduled for a later date.

source: Le couple s'était marié au Texas il y a un an et était venu à Buffalo pour fêter l'occasion avec des amis et des parents.
reference: The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives.
translation: The couple got married in Texas a year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives.

source: Le mari, âgé de 30 ans et natif de Buffalo, faisait partie des quatre victimes de la tuerie, mais sa femme n'a pas été blessée.
reference: The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.
translation: French text: The husband, 30 years old and from Buffalo, was one of the four victims of the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

source: Célèbre mais pas moins controversé tuteur d'anglais ayant enseigné à Modern Education et à King's Glory, Karno a affirmé avoir dirigé 9 000 étudiants au plus fort de sa carrière.
reference: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career.
translation: Karno is a well-known but not less controversial English tutor who taught at Modern Education and King's Glory. Karno claimed to have taught 9,000 students at the peak of his career.

source: Dans ses notes, il a utilisé des mots que certains parents considèrent comme grossiers, et il aurait utilisé des jurons en classe.
reference: In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class.
translation: In his notes, he used words that some parents consider coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class.

source: Modern Education l'a accusé d'avoir imprimé sans autorisation de grandes annonces sur les bus, et d'avoir prétendu être le tuteur principal d'anglais.
reference: Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor.
translation: French text: Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without permission, and of claiming to be the principal tutor in English.

source: Il a également été accusé précédemment de violation du droit d'auteur, mais n'a pas été inculpé.
reference: He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged.
translation: He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged.

source: Un ancien étudiant a affirmé qu’il « utilisait de l’argot en classe, enseignait les techniques de drague dans des écrits, et se comportait comme l’ami des étudiants ».
reference: A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'
translation: French text: An old student said that he "used slang in class, taught dating techniques in notes, and acted as the students' friend".

source: Au cours des trois dernières décennies, bien qu’elle soit officiellement restée un État communiste, la Chine a développé une économie de marché.
reference: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy.
translation: French text: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy.

source: Les premières réformes économiques ont été réalisées sous la direction de Deng Xiaoping.
reference: The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping.
translation: French text: The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping.

source: Depuis, la taille économique de la Chine a été multipliée par 90.
reference: Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times.
translation: Since then, China's economic size has been 90 times that of France.

source: Pour la première fois, l'année dernière, la Chine a exporté plus de voitures que l'Allemagne et a dépassé les États-Unis en tant que plus grand marché pour cette industrie.
reference: For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry.
translation: French text: For the first time, last year, China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the largest market for this industry.

source: Le PIB de la Chine pourrait dépasser celui des États-Unis au cours des deux décennies à venir.
reference: China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.
translation: Chinese GDP could surpass the US within the next two decades.

source: La tempête tropicale Danielle, quatrième tempête nommée de la saison des ouragans atlantiques 2010, s'est formée dans l'est de l'océan Atlantique.
reference: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean.
translation: The 2010 Atlantic hurricane season is now over. The fourth named storm of the season, Tropical Storm Danielle, formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean.

source: La vitesse maximale des vents soutenus de cette tempête, qui se produit à environ 4 800 km de Miami, en Floride, atteint 64 km/h.
reference: The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph).
translation: The maximum sustained winds of this storm, located about 4,800 km from Miami, Florida, reach 64 km/h.

source: Les scientifiques du Centre national des ouragans prévoient que Danielle se transformera en ouragan d’ici mercredi.
reference: Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday.
translation: French text: Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will become a hurricane by Wednesday.

source: Comme la tempête est loin d'atteindre les côtes, il reste difficile d'évaluer son impact potentiel sur les États-Unis ou les Caraïbes.
reference: As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.
translation: French text: As the storm is far from landfall, it's difficult to assess potential impact on the United States or the Caribbean.

source: Né à Zagreb, la capitale croate, Bobek s'est fait connaître en jouant pour le Partizan Belgrade.
reference: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade.
translation: Born in Zagreb, the capital of Croatia, Bobek made his name playing for Partizan Belgrade.

source: Il le rejoint en 1945 et y reste jusqu'en 1958.
reference: He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958.
translation: French text: He joined him in 1945 and stayed until 1958.

source: Au cours de son passage au sein de l'équipe, il a marqué 403 buts en l'espace de 468 rencontres.
reference: During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances.
translation: French text: During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances.

source: Aucun autre joueur n'a jamais fait plus d'apparitions ou marqué plus de buts pour le club que Bobek.
reference: No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek.
translation: French text: No other player has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek.

source: En 1995, il fut élu meilleur joueur de l'histoire du Partizan.
reference: In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.
translation: French text: In 1995, he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

source: Les festivités ont débuté par un spectacle spécial du groupe de renommée mondiale Cirque du Soleil.
reference: The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil.
translation: French text: The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned Cirque du Soleil.

source: Ont suivi l'Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, un groupe janissaire, puis les chanteurs Fatih Erkoç et Müslüm Gürses.
reference: It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses.
translation: The following is a translation of the French text: The Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra followed, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses.

source: Puis les derviches tourneurs sont montés sur scène.
reference: Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage.
translation: French text: Then the Dervishes took to the stage.

source: La diva turque Sezen Aksu s'est produite avec le ténor italien Alessandro Safina et la chanteuse grecque Haris Alexiou.
reference: Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou.
translation: Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou.

source: Pour terminer, le groupe de danse turc Fire of Anatolia a présenté le spectacle « Troy ».
reference: To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show "Troy".
translation: To finish, the Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia presented the show "Troy".

source: Peter Lenz, un pilote de moto de 13 ans, est mort après avoir été impliqué dans un accident sur l'Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
reference: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
translation: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in an accident at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

source: Pendant le tour d'échauffement, Lenz est tombé de sa moto, puis a été heurté par son compagnon de course Xavier Zayat.
reference: While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat.
translation: French text: During the warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, then was struck by his teammate Xavier Zayat.

source: Il a été immédiatement pris en charge par le personnel médical sur la piste et transporté dans un hôpital local où il est mort par la suite.
reference: He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died.
translation: French text: He was immediately attended to by the medical staff on the track and transported to a local hospital where he later died.

source: Zayat est sorti indemne de l'accident.
reference: Zayat was unhurt in the accident.
translation: Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

source: "En ce qui concerne la situation financière mondiale, Zapatero a poursuivi en disant que ""le système financier fait partie de l’économie, un élément essentiel."
reference: Regarding the global financial situation, Zapatero continued by saying that "the financial system is a part of the economy, a crucial part.
translation: French text: Regarding the global financial situation, Zapatero continued by saying that ""the financial system is part of the economy, an essential part."""

source: Nous traversons une crise financière d'un an, qui a connu son moment le plus aigu au cours des deux derniers mois, et je pense que maintenant les marchés financiers commencent à se redresser. »
reference: We have a year-long financial crisis, which has had its most acute moment in the past two months, and I think now the financial markets are beginning to recover."
translation: French text: We are in a one-year financial crisis, which has its most acute moment in the past two months, and I think now the financial markets are beginning to recover. »

source: La semaine passée, Naked News a annoncé son intention d'augmenter sérieusement le nombre d'heures dédiées au journal en langue internationale, avec trois nouveaux programmes à la clé.
reference: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts.
translation: French text: Last week, Naked News announced that it would significantly increase the number of hours dedicated to international language news, with three new programs on the horizon.

source: Déjà présente en anglais et en japonais, l’organisation mondiale lance des programmes en espagnol, en italien et en coréen, pour la télévision, le web et les appareils mobiles.
reference: Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
translation: French text: With English and Japanese already available, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean programs for television, the web, and mobile devices.

source: Par chance, il ne m'est rien arrivé, mais j'ai assisté à une scène macabre, où des gens essayaient de briser des vitres afin de sortir.
reference: "Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out.
translation: Luckily, nothing happened to me, but I witnessed a macabre scene, where people tried to break the windows to get out.

source: Les gens frappaient les vitres avec des chaises, mais les fenêtres étaient incassables.
reference: People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable.
translation: French text: People were hitting the windows with chairs, but the windows were indestructible.

source: « Une des vitres s'est finalement brisée, et ils ont commencé à sortir par la fenêtre », a déclaré Franciszek Kowal, un survivant.
reference: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal.
translation: French text: One of the windows finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said Franciszek Kowal, a survivor.

source: Les corps stellaires dégagent lumière et chaleur à cause de l'énergie créée lorsque les atomes d'hydrogène fusionnent (ou se condensent) pour créer des éléments plus lourds.
reference: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements.
translation: French text: Star bodies emit light and heat because of the energy created when hydrogen atoms fuse (or condense) to form heavier elements.

source: Les scientifiques travaillent à la création d'un réacteur qui peut produire de l'énergie de la même manière.
reference: Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way.
translation: French text: Scientists are working on a reactor that can produce energy in the same way.

source: Ceci, cependant, est un problème très difficile à résoudre et il faudra de nombreuses années avant de voir construire des réacteurs à fusion fructueux.
reference: This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.
translation: French: Ce problème est très difficile à résoudre et il faudra de nombreuses années avant de voir construire des réacteurs à fusion fructueux.

source: L'aiguille en acier reste immergée à cause de la tension à la surface.
reference: The steel needle floats on top of the water because of surface tension.
translation: French text: The steel needle floats on top of the water because of surface tension.

source: La tension de la surface se crée parce que le magnétisme entre les molécules d'eau à la surface est tellement plus fort qu'avec les molécules d'air au dessus d'elles.
reference: Surface tension happens because the water molecules at the surface of the water are strongly attracted to each other more than they are to the air molecules above them.
translation: The surface tension is created because the magnetic attraction between the water molecules at the surface is stronger than the magnetic attraction between the air molecules above them.

source: Les molécules d'eau forment une pellicule invisible à la surface qui permet à des objets comme l'aiguille de flotter sur l'eau.
reference: The water molecules make an invisible skin on the water’s surface that allows things like the needle to float on top of the water.
translation: French text: The water molecules form a invisible film on the surface that allows things like the needle to float on the water.

source: La lame d'un patin à glace moderne est dotée de deux extrémités avec un creux concave situé entre les deux. Ces deux extrémités permettent une meilleure adhérence à la glace, même lorsqu'elles sont inclinées.
reference: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted.
translation: French text: The blade of a modern ice skate has two ends with a concave hollow between them. These two ends allow a better grip on the ice, even when tilted.

source: Comme le bas de la lame est légèrement incurvé, lorsque la lame s'incline d'un côté ou de l'autre, le bord qui est en contact avec la glace s'incurve également.
reference: Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves.
translation: French text: As the blade is slightly curved, when the blade bends to one side or the other, the edge that is in contact with the ice also bends.

source: Cela fait tourner le patineur. Si les patins penchent vers la droite, le patineur tourne à droite, si les patins penchent vers la gauche, le patineur tourne à gauche.
reference: This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.
translation: French text: This is why the skater turns. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.

source: Pour retourner au niveau d'énergie précédent, il leur faut se débarrasser de l'excès d'énergie emmagasiné au contact de la lumière.
reference: To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light.
translation: French text: To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the excess energy they have absorbed from the light.

source: Ils le font en émettant une minuscule particule de lumière appelée « photon ».
reference: They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a "photon".
translation: French text: They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a "photon".

source: Les scientifiques appellent ce processus « émission stimulée de rayonnement », car les atomes sont stimulés par la lumière vive, ce qui provoque l’émission d’un photon de lumière (la lumière étant un type de rayonnement).
reference: Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation.
translation: French text: Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation", because atoms are stimulated by bright light, which causes the emission of a photon of light (light being a type of radiation).

source: L'image suivante montre les atomes qui émettent des photons. Bien entendu en réalité les photons sont bien plus petits que ceux représentés sur l'image.
reference: The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture.
translation: French text: The next image shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are much smaller than those in the image.

source: Les photons sont même plus petits que les particules formant les atomes !
reference: Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!
translation: French text: Photons are even smaller than the atoms that make up atoms!

source: Après des centaines d'heures de fonctionnement, le filament dans l'ampoule finit par brûler et l'ampoule électrique ne marche plus.
reference: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works.
translation: French text: After hundreds of hours of operation, the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works.

source: L'ampoule doit alors être remplacée. Il faut être prudent lors du changement de l'ampoule.
reference: The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb.
translation: French text: The bulb then needs replacing. Be careful when replacing the bulb.

source: Tout d’abord, l’interrupteur de l’appareil d’éclairage doit être éteint ou le câble débranché.
reference: First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected.
translation: First, the switch for the light fixture must be turned off or the cable disconnected.
