translation: Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti.

source: En dehors des plages de sable blanc et des paysages de montagne, le pays héberge la plus ancienne ville européenne des Amériques, qui font aujourd'hui partie de Saint-Domingue.
reference: Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo.
translation: French text: Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, which now forms part of Santo Domingo.

source: L’île fut en premier lieu habitée par les Taínos et les Caribes. Ces dernier peuple parlait l'Arawakan ; il serait arrivé environ dix mille ans av. J.-C.
reference: The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE.
translation: The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. These people spoke the Arawakan language; it is estimated that they arrived about ten thousand years ago.

source: En quelques années à peine après l'arrivée des explorateurs européens, la population d'indigènes Taïnos avait considérablement diminué du fait des conquistadors espagnols.
reference: Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors
translation: French text: In a few short years after European explorers arrived, the population of the Taíno Indians had significantly decreased due to the Spanish conquerors.

source: D'après le frère Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias), entre 1492 et 1498, les conquistadors espagnols auraient tué environ 100 000 Taínos.
reference: Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.
translation: French text: According to Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias), between 1492 and 1498, Spanish conquerors killed about 100,000 Taínos.

source: Jardín de la Unión. Cet espace a été construit en tant qu'atrium d'un couvent du XVIIe siècle, dont le Templo de San Diego est le seul bâtiment survivant.
reference: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building.
translation: French text: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as an atrium for a 17th century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the only surviving building.

source: Il fonctionne maintenant comme la place centrale, et il y a toujours beaucoup de choses qui se passent, de jour comme de nuit.
reference: It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night.
translation: French text: It is now functioning as the central plaza, and there is always a lot going on, day and night.

source: On peut trouver un grand nombre de restaurants autour du jardin, et des concerts gratuits ont souvent lieu l'après-midi et le soir depuis le kiosque central.
reference: There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo.
translation: French text: There are a lot of restaurants around the garden, and free concerts often take place in the afternoon and evening from the central kiosk.

source: Callejon del Beso (l’allée du baiser). Deux balcons séparés par seulement 69 centimètres abritent une ancienne légende d’amour.
reference: Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend.
translation: French text: Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters contain an old love legend.

source: Pour quelques pièces de monnaie, des enfants vous raconteront l’histoire.
reference: For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.
translation: French text: For a few pennies, children will tell you the story.

source: Bowen Island est une excursion populaire d'une journée ou d'un week-end qui propose du kayak, des randonnées, des boutiques, des restaurants, et plus encore.
reference: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more.
translation: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more.

source: Cette communauté authentique se trouve à Howe Sound, juste à côté de Vancouver, et elle est facilement accessible par des bateaux-taxis qui partent régulièrement de Granville Island, dans le centre-ville de Vancouver.
reference: This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver.
translation: French text: This authentic community is located in Howe Sound, just off Vancouver, and is easily accessible by taxis that depart Granville Island in downtown Vancouver.

source: Pour ceux qui aiment les activités de plein air, une randonnée dans le couloir Sea to Sky est indispensable.
reference: For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential.
translation: For those who love outdoor activities, a Sea to Sky hike is essential.

source: Whistler (à une heure et demi de route partant de Vancouver) est cher, mais s'est fait connaître grâce aux Jeux olympiques d'hiver de 2010.
reference: Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics.
translation: Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive, but became famous due to the 2010 Winter Olympics.

source: En hiver, profitez de certaines des meilleurs pistes de skis d'Amérique du Nord et, en été, goûtez à d'authentiques randonnées en VTT.
reference: In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.
translation: In winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America and, in summer, try authentic mountain biking.

source: Les permis doivent être réservés à l'avance. Vous devez avoir un permis pour passer la nuit au Sirena.
reference: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena.
translation: French text: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena.

source: Sirena est le seul poste de gardes forestiers qui offre un hébergement en dortoir et des repas chauds en plus du camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo et Los Patos n'offrent que des emplacements de camping sans service de restauration.
reference: Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service.
translation: Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping without food service.

source: Il est possible d’obtenir des permis d'accès au parc directement depuis la station de gardes forestiers de Puerto Jiménez, mais les cartes de crédit ne sont pas acceptées.
reference: It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards
translation: French text: It is possible to get park permits directly from the Ranger Station at Puerto Jiménez, but credit cards are not accepted.

source: Le bureau du parc (MINAE) ne délivre pas de permis plus d’un mois avant l’arrivée prévue.
reference: The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival.
translation: French text: The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival.

source: CafeNet El Sol propose un service de réservation pour un montant de 30 dollars, ou 10 dollars pour un forfait d'une journée ; en savoir plus sur leur page Corcovado.
reference: CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.
translation: French text: CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of $30, or $10 for a one-day pass; more information on their Corcovado page.

source: L'archipel des îles Cook est un État en libre association avec la Nouvelle-Zélande, situé en Polynésie, au milieu de l'océan Pacifique sud.
reference: The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean.
translation: French text: The Cook Islands is an independent state in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean.

source: Il s'agit d'un archipel de 15 îles réparties sur 2,2 millions de km carrés d'océan.
reference: It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean.
translation: French: Il s'agit d'un archipel de 15 îles réparties sur 2,2 millions de km carrés d'océan.

source: Avec le même fuseau horaire qu’Hawaï, les îles sont parfois considérées comme « Hawaï de l’Océanie ».
reference: With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as "Hawaii down under".
translation: French text: With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes referred to as "Hawaii of the Pacific".

source: Bien que plus petite, elle rappelle à certains visiteurs âgés l'île d'Hawaii avant qu'elle ne devienne un État avec de nombreux grands hôtels touristiques et aménagements.
reference: Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development.
translation: Although smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before it became a state with many large tourist hotels and other development.

source: Aucune ville sur les îles Cook mais elles sont composées de 15 îles différentes. Les principales s’appellent Rarotonga et Aitutaki.
reference: The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
translation: French text: There are no cities on the Cook Islands, but they are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.

source: Aujourd'hui, dans les pays développés, l'offre de chambres d'hôtes de luxe a été élevée à une sorte de forme artistique.
reference: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form.
translation: French text: Today, in developed countries, the offer of luxury bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art form.

source: Dans le haut de gamme, les chambres d’hôtes se font évidemment concurrence principalement sur deux points : la literie et le petit déjeuner.
reference: At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast.
translation: French text: In the upper end, the B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two points: bedding and breakfast.

source: En conséquence, il est possible de trouver dans les meilleurs établissements de cette catégorie une literie extrêmement luxueuse, comme par exemple un édredon fait main ou un lit ancien.
reference: Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed.
translation: As a result, it is possible to find the best of this category in the finest hotels, such as a handmade quilt or an antique bed.

source: Le petit déjeuner peut comprendre des délices de saison de la région ou le plat de spécialité de l’hôte.
reference: Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish.
translation: Breakfast: The breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish.

source: Le cadre pourrait être un vieux bâtiment historique avec des meubles anciens, un terrain entretenu et une piscine.
reference: The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.
translation: French text: The setting could be an old historic building with antique furniture, a well maintained yard and a swimming pool.

source: Monter dans sa propre voiture et partir pour un long voyage a un attrait intrinsèque dans sa simplicité.
reference: Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity.
translation: French text: Getting into your own car and taking a long journey has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity.

source: Contrairement aux gros véhicules, vous êtes probablement déjà familiarisé avec la conduite de votre voiture et connaissez ses limites.
reference: Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations.
translation: French text: Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limits.

source: Installer sa tente sur une propriété privée ou dans une ville, quelle qu'en soit la taille, peut facilement attirer l'attention.
reference: Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention.
translation: French text: Setting up a tent on private property or in a city, whatever its size, can easily attract attention.

source: En bref, utiliser votre voiture est un excellent moyen de faire un voyage par la route, mais rarement en soi un moyen de « camper ».
reference: In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to "camp".
translation: In short, using your car is an excellent way to travel by road, but seldom in itself a means of "camping".

source: Le camping en voiture est possible si vous disposez d'un grand monospace, d'un SUV, d'une berline ou d'un break avec des sièges qui s'allongent.
reference: Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down.
translation: French text: Car camping is possible if you have a large family car, SUV, sedan or station wagon with seats that can be extended.

source: Certains hôtels conservent leur héritage remontant à l'âge d'or des trains à vapeur et des paquebots transatlantiques du XIXe siècle et début du XXe, avant la Deuxième guerre mondiale.
reference: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries.
translation: French text: Some hotels have their heritage from the golden age of steam railways and transatlantic passenger ships of the 19th and early 20th centuries before World War II.

source: Ces hôtels accueillaient les nantis et les célébrités de l'époque, et on y donnait régulièrement de somptueux dîners et de superbes réceptions.
reference: These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife.
translation: French text: These hotels hosted the rich and famous of the day, and they often hosted lavish dinners and superb receptions.

source: L'aménagement vieillot, l'absence d'équipements récents et un certain charme à l'ancienne font également partie de leur caractère.
reference: The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character.
translation: French text: The old-fashioned furniture, the lack of modern amenities and a certain charm of the past also make up their character.

source: Bien qu’ils soient le plus souvent privés, certains accueillent parfois des chefs d’État ou d’autres dignitaires.
reference: While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries.
translation: French text: Although they are usually privately owned, some of them sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state or other dignitaries.

source: Le voyageur qui dispose de sommes considérables peut envisager un tour du monde en avion, entrecoupé de séjours dans nombre de ces hôtels.
reference: A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.
translation: French text: The traveller with a large sum of money can consider a round-the-world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

source: Un réseau d’échange d’hospitalité est l’organisation qui met en relation les voyageurs avec les habitants des villes qu’ils vont visiter.
reference: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit.
translation: French text: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit.

source: Rejoindre un tel réseau ne nécessite généralement que de remplir un formulaire en ligne ; bien que certains réseaux proposent ou nécessitent une vérification complémentaire.
reference: Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification.
translation: French text: Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification.

source: Une liste des hôtes disponibles est ensuite fournie soit en version imprimée et / ou en ligne, parfois avec des références et des avis d'autres voyageurs.
reference: A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers.
translation: A list of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews from other travelers.

source: L'entreprise Couchsurfing a été fondée en janvier 2004 par le programmeur informatique Casey Fenton, qui avait trouvé un vol bon marché pour l'Islande, mais pas de point de chute pour y séjourner.
reference: Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay.
translation: French text: The French company Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 by computer programmer Casey Fenton, who found a cheap flight to Iceland, but no place to stay.

source: Il a envoyé un e-mail aux étudiants de l'université locale et a reçu un nombre impressionnant d'offres d'hébergement gratuit.
reference: He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.
translation: French text: He emailed the students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of free accommodation offers.

source: Les auberges s’adressent principalement aux jeunes – un client typique a une vingtaine d’années – mais on y trouve aussi souvent des voyageurs plus âgés.
reference: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too.
translation: French text: Hostels cater primarily to young people - a typical guest is in their twenties - but you can often find older travellers there too.

source: Les familles avec enfants sont rares, mais certaines auberges les acceptent dans des chambres privées.
reference: Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.
translation: French text: Families with children are rare, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

source: La ville de Pékin en Chine sera l'hôte des Jeux Olympiques d'hiver en 2022, ce qui en fera la première ville à avoir accueilli les Jeux d'été et ceux d'hiver.
reference: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics.
translation: Chinese city of Beijing in China will host the Winter Olympics in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both Summer and Winter Olympics.

source: Pékin accueillera les cérémonies d'ouverture et de clôture ainsi que les épreuves sur glace en salle.
reference: Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events.
translation: Chinese: 北京將主辦開幕式和閉幕式，還有室內冰上項目。

source: D'autres épreuves de ski se dérouleront dans la station de ski de Taizicheng à Zhangjiakou, à environ 220 km (140 pieds) de Pékin.
reference: Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
translation: French text: Other skiing events will be taking place at Taizicheng ski resort in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

source: La plupart des temples tiennent un festival annuel qui commence en fin novembre et se termine à la mi-mai, qui varie selon le calendrier annuel de chacun.
reference: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar.
translation: French text: Most of the temples hold an annual festival that starts in the end of November and ends in the middle of May, which varies according to the annual calendar of each temple.

source: La plupart des festivals du temple sont célébrés dans le cadre de l'anniversaire du temple, de la divinité qui le préside, ou à l'occasion de tout autre événement majeur associé au temple.
reference: Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple.
translation: French text: Most of the temple festivals are celebrated in the context of the temple's birthday, presiding deity, or any other major event associated with the temple.

source: Les festivals des temples du Kerala sont très intéressants à voir, avec de fréquentes processions d'éléphants décorés, l'orchestre du temple, et d'autres festivités.
reference: Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
translation: The Kerala temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra, and other festivities.

source: Une exposition internationale (communément appelée exposition universelle ou tout simplement expo) est un grand festival international des arts et des sciences.
reference: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences.
translation: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition or simply Expo) is an international festival of arts and sciences.

source: Les pays participants organisent des expositions artistiques et éducatives dans leurs pavillons nationaux pour mettre en lumière les problèmes mondiaux ou la culture et l'histoire de leur pays.
reference: Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history.
translation: French text: Participating countries organize artistic and educational exhibitions in their pavilions to highlight global issues or their country's culture and history.

source: Les expositions horticoles internationales sont des événements spécialisés qui présentent des vitrines florales, des jardins botaniques et tout ce qui concerne les plantes.
reference: International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants.
translation: French text: International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events that showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants.

source: Bien qu'elles puisent théoriquement avoir lieu tous les ans (à condition que ce soit dans des pays différents), dans la pratique, ce n'est pas le cas.
reference: Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not.
translation: French text: Although they can theoretically take place annually (provided they are in different countries), in practice, they are not.

source: Ces manifestations durent normalement entre trois et six mois et se déroulent sur des sites d’au moins 50 hectares.
reference: These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.
translation: French text: These demonstrations normally last between three and six months and take place on sites of at least 50 hectares.

source: Il existe de nombreux formats de films différents qui ont été utilisés au fil des ans. Le film standard 35 mm (négatif 36 par 24 mm) est de loin le plus courant.
reference: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest.
translation: French text: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is by far the most common.

source: Il peut généralement être réapprovisionné assez facilement en cas d'épuisement et offre une résolution à peu près comparable à celle d'un reflex numérique actuel.
reference: It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR.
translation: French text: It can usually be replenished fairly easily in case of depletion and offers resolution roughly comparable to that of a current DSLR.

source: Certaines caméras de moyen format utilisent un format de 6 par 6 cm, plus précisément un négatif de 56 par 56 mm.
reference: Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative.
translation: French text: Some medium-format cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative.

source: Cela donne une résolution presque quatre fois supérieure à celle d'un négatif de 35 mm (3136 mm2 contre 864).
reference: This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).
translation: This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

source: La faune et la flore sauvages sont des thèmes parmi les plus difficiles à capturer pour un photographe, et nécessitent une combinaison de chance, de patience, d'expérience et un bon équipement.
reference: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment.
translation: French text: Wildlife is among the most challenging subjects for a photographer, and requires a combination of luck, patience, experience and good equipment.

source: La photographie de la vie sauvage est souvent considérée comme allant de soi, mais comme pour la photographie en général, une image vaut mille mots.
reference: Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words.
translation: French text: Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words.

source: La photographie de la vie sauvage nécessite souvent un long téléobjectif. Toutefois, d'autres scènes comme une volée d'oiseaux ou une minuscule créature exigent l'utilisation d'autres objectifs.
reference: Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses.
translation: French text: Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens. However, other scenes such as a flock of birds or a tiny creature require other lenses.

source: De nombreux animaux exotiques sont difficiles à trouver, et les parcs ont parfois des règles relatives à la prise de photos à des fins commerciales.
reference: Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes.
translation: French: De nombreux animaux exotiques sont difficiles à trouver, et les parcs ont parfois des règles relatives à la prise de photos à des fins commerciales.

source: Les animaux sauvages peuvent être timides ou agressifs. L'environnement peut être froid, chaud ou autrement hostile.
reference: Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.
translation: French: Les animaux sauvages peuvent être timides ou agressifs. L'environnement peut être froid, chaud ou autrement hostile.

source: Le monde compte plus de 5000 langues différentes, dont une vingtaine avec 50 millions de locuteurs ou plus.
reference: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers.
translation: French text: The world has more than 5000 different languages, including twenty with 50 million or more speakers.

source: Les mots écrits sont également souvent plus faciles à comprendre que les mots prononcés. C'est particulièrement vrai pour les adresses, qui sont souvent difficiles à prononcer de manière compréhensible.
reference: Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly.
translation: French text: Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly.

source: De nombreuses nations, dans leur ensemble, parlent couramment l'anglais, et dans bien d'autres pays, on peut s'attendre à en trouver une connaissance partielle, surtout chez les jeunes.
reference: Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people.
translation: French text: Many nations, in general, speak English fluently, and in many others, you can expect to find a limited knowledge, especially among young people.

source: Imaginez, si vous le voulez bien, un habitant de Manchester, un habitant de Boston, un Jamaïcain et un habitant de Sydney, assis autour d’une même table de restaurant à Toronto.
reference: Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto.
translation: Imagine, if you will, a Manchester, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydney resident sitting around a table at a restaurant in Toronto.

source: Ils se régalent les uns les autres d’histoires de leurs villes natales, racontées avec leurs accents prononcés et leur argot local.
reference: They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.
translation: French text: They are sharing stories of their hometowns, told with their distinct accents and local argot.

source: Acheter de la nourriture dans les supermarchés est généralement le moyen le moins cher de se nourrir. Sans possibilité de cuisiner, les choix sont cependant limités aux aliments prêts à l'emploi.
reference: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food.
translation: French text: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to feed yourself. Without the ability to cook, choices are however limited to ready-made food.

source: Les supermarchés proposent de manière croissante une gamme plus variée de plats cuisinés. Certains fournissent même un four à micro-ondes ou d'autres moyens pour réchauffer la nourriture.
reference: Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food.
translation: French text: Supermarkets are increasingly offering a wider range of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food.

source: Dans certains pays ou types de lieux de vente, on trouve au moins un restaurant sur place, souvent assez informel et pratiquant des prix abordables.
reference: In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.
translation: French text: In some countries or types of stores, there is at least one restaurant on site, often informal and with affordable prices.

source: Faites des copies de votre police d'assurance et des coordonnées de votre assureur et emportez-les avec vous.
reference: Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you.
translation: French text: Make copies of your insurance policy and your insurer's contact information and bring them with you.

source: Ils doivent présenter l'adresse e-mail et les numéros de téléphone internationaux de l'assureur pour obtenir des conseils/autorisations et effectuer les demandes d'indemnisation.
reference: They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims.
translation: French text: They need to provide the insurance company's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims.

source: Ayez à disposition une autre copie dans vos bagages et en ligne (e-mail adressé à vous-même avec pièce jointe, ou stocké dans le « cloud »).
reference: Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the "cloud").
translation: French text: Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the "cloud").

source: Si vous voyagez avec un ordinateur portable ou une tablette, conservez une copie dans sa mémoire ou son disque (accessibles hors connexion).
reference: If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet).
translation: French text: If traveling with a laptop or tablet, keep a copy in its memory or disc (accessible offline).

source: Donnez également des exemplaires de la réglementation et des contacts aux compagnons de voyage et aux parents ou amis à la maison qui sont prêts à vous aider.
reference: Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help.
translation: French text: Also give travelers copies of the regulations and contacts to fellow travelers and relatives or friends at home who are willing to help.

source: Les élans ne sont pas de nature agressive, mais se défendront s’ils se sentent en danger.
reference: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat.
translation: French text: Moose are not inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat.

source: Lorsque les gens ne considèrent pas les élans comme potentiellement dangereux, ils peuvent s'approcher de trop près et se mettre en péril.
reference: When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.
translation: French text: When people don't consider moose potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

source: Buvez des boissons alcoolisées avec modération. L'alcool a des effets différents sur chacun, et il est très important de connaître ses limites.
reference: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important.
translation: French text: Drink alcohol in moderation. Alcohol has different effects on each person, and it's very important to know your limits.

source: Parmi les problèmes de santé possibles à long terme dus à l’alcoolisme, on peut citer les dégâts sur le foie, mais aussi la cécité et la mort. Le danger potentiel est accru en cas de consommation d’alcool fabriqué illégalement.
reference: Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol.
translation: French text: Among the possible long term health problems from alcohol abuse, liver damage is one of the most common, but also blindness and death. The potential danger is increased in the case of illegal alcohol production.

source: Les spiritueux illicites peuvent contenir diverses impuretés dangereuses, y compris du méthanol, qui peut causer la cécité ou la mort, même à petites doses.
reference: Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
translation: French text: Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities, including methanol, which can cause blindness or death, even at low doses.

source: Les lunettes de vue peuvent coûter moins cher à l’étranger, en particulier dans les pays à faible revenu dans lesquels le coût du travail est plus bas.
reference: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower.
translation: French text: Eyeglasses can be cheaper abroad, especially in low-income countries where labor costs are lower.

source: Pensez à vous faire examiner les yeux à domicile, surtout si votre assurance le couvre, et à ramener l'ordonnance qui sera ensuite déposée ailleurs.
reference: Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere.
translation: French text: Think about getting your eyes examined at home, especially if your insurance covers it, and bring the prescription along to be filed elsewhere.

source: Les cadres de marque haut de gamme vendus dans de telles régions du monde peuvent présenter deux problèmes : certains peuvent être des contrefaçons, et les cadres véritablement importés peuvent être plus chers que dans votre pays.
reference: High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.
translation: French text: High-end brand frames sold in such regions of the world may have two problems: some may be counterfeits, and imported frames may be more expensive than in your country.

source: Le café est l’une des marchandises les plus vendues au monde, et vous pouvez probablement en trouver de nombreux types dans votre région d’origine.
reference: Coffee is one of the world's most traded commodities, and you can probably find many types in your home region.
translation: French text: Coffee is one of the most sold commodities in the world, and you probably can find many types in your home region.

source: Néanmoins, il existe de nombreuses façons de boire le café dans le monde entier qui valent la peine d'être expérimentées.
reference: Nevertheless, there are many distinctive ways of drinking coffee around the world that are worth experiencing.
translation: Nevertheless, there are many ways to drink coffee around the world that are worth experiencing.

source: Le canyoning (ou canyonisme) consiste à se rendre en bas d’un canyon, qui est soit sec, soit plein d’eau.
reference: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water.
translation: Canyoning (or canyoneering) consists of going down a canyon, which is either dry or full of water.

source: Le canyoning combine des éléments de natation, d'escalade et de saut, mais nécessite relativement peu d'entraînement ou de forme physique pour débuter, par rapport à, par exemple,  l'escalade, la plongée sous-marine ou le ski alpin.
reference: Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).
translation: French text: Canyoning combines elements of swimming, climbing and jumping, but requires relatively little training or physical shape to start, compared to, for example, climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing.

source: La randonnée est une activité de plein air qui consiste à marcher dans des environnements naturels, souvent sur des sentiers de randonnée.
reference: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails.
translation: Hiking is an outdoor activity that consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails.

source: Une randonnée d'une journée implique des distances de moins d'un mile jusqu'à des distances plus longues pouvant être parcourues en un seul jour.
reference: Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day.
translation: French text: A day hike involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day.

source: Pour une randonnée d'une journée sur un sentier peu difficile, il suffit de quelques préparatifs et toute personne relativement en bonne santé peut en profiter.
reference: For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them.
translation: French text: For a day hike on a moderately difficult trail, a few preparations are needed and any moderately fit person can enjoy them.

source: Les familles ayant de jeunes enfants peuvent avoir besoin de plus de préparation, mais il est possible de passer une journée en plein air, même avec des bébés et des enfants d’âge préscolaire.
reference: Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.
translation: French text: Families with young children may need more preparation, but a day outdoors is possible even with babies and pre-school children.

source: Sur le plan international, il existe près de 200 organisations de visite en course à pied. La plupart d’entre elles fonctionnent indépendamment.
reference: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently.
translation: French text: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently.

source: Le successeur de Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours, met en réseau des dizaines de prestataires de services de jogging touristique sur quatre continents.
reference: The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents.
translation: French text: The successor of Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours, has connected dozens of tourism providers in four continents.

source: Ayant ses racines dans le Running Tours Barcelona de Barcelone et le Running Copenhagen de Copenhague, elle a rapidement été rejointe par le Running Tours Prague basé à Prague et d'autres.
reference: With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.
translation: Running Tours Barcelona, Running Copenhagen and Running Tours Prague all have roots in Barcelona and Copenhagen.

source: Il y a de nombreuses choses à prendre en considération avant et pendant que vous voyagez.
reference: There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere.
translation: French text: There are many things to take into consideration before and during your trip.

source: Lorsque vous voyagez, attendez-vous à ce que les choses ne soient pas comme « chez vous ». Les manières, les lois, la nourriture, la circulation, le logement, les normes, la langue, etc. diffèrent dans une certaine mesure de l’endroit où vous vivez.
reference: When you travel, expect things not to be like they are "back home". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live.
translation: When traveling, expect things not to be like "back home." Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language, etc. will differ somewhat from where you live.

source: C'est quelque chose que vous devez toujours garder à l'esprit pour éviter toute déception ou peut-être même toute aversion à l'égard des comportements locaux.
reference: This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things.
translation: French text: This is something you should always keep in mind to avoid disappointment or perhaps even aversion to local behavior.

source: Les agences de voyage existent depuis le XIXe siècle. Un voyagiste est généralement une bonne option pour un périple qui dépasse le cadre des expériences précédentes du voyageur en matière de nature, culture, langue, ou pays à faible revenu.
reference: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries.
translation: French text: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a trip that goes beyond the traveler's previous experience of nature, culture, language, or low-income countries.

source: Bien que la plupart des agences soient disposées à prendre en charge la plupart des réservations régulières, de nombreux agents sont spécialisés dans des types de voyages, des gammes de prix ou des destinations plus spécifiques.
reference: Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations.
translation: French text: Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in certain types of travel, price ranges or destinations.

source: Il peut être préférable de faire appel à un agent qui réserve fréquemment des voyages similaires au vôtre.
reference: It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours.
translation: French text: It may be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours.

source: Jetez un coup d’œil aux voyages dont l’agent fait la promotion, que ce soit sur un site internet ou en vitrine.
reference: Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.
translation: French text: Take a look at the trips that the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

source: Si vous voulez voir le monde à bas prix, par nécessité, mode de vie ou défi, il existe quelques moyens de le faire.
reference: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that.
translation: French text: If you want to see the world cheaply, necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that.

source: En gros, on peut les classer en deux catégories : soit vous travaillez pendant votre voyage, soit vous essayez de limiter vos dépenses. Le présent article porte essentiellement sur cette dernière catégorie.
reference: Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter.
translation: In short, you can classify them into two categories: either you work while traveling or you try to limit your expenses. The main article is about the latter.

source: Pour ceux qui sont prêts à sacrifier le confort, le temps et la prévisibilité pour réduire les dépenses à près de zéro, consultez le voyage à budget minimum.
reference: For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel.
translation: French text: For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to reduce expenses to near zero, check out the minimum budget travel.

source: Ces conseils partent du principe que les voyageurs ne volent pas, ne s’introduisent pas dans un lieu public, ne participent pas au marché illégal, ne mendient pas ou n’exploitent pas d’autres personnes à leur profit.
reference: The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.
translation: French text: These advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, enter public places, participate in the illegal market, beg or exploit others for their own gain.

source: Un point de contrôle d'immigration est habituellement la première étape lorsque vous débarquez d'un avion, d'un bateau ou d'un autre véhicule.
reference: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle.
translation: French text: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle.

source: Dans certains trains transfrontaliers, les inspections sont menées dans le train en marche et vous devez avoir une pièce d'identité valide sur vous lorsque vous voyagez dans l'un de ces trains.
reference: In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains.
translation: French text: In some cross-border trains inspections are carried out on the train in motion and you must have valid ID with you when traveling in one of these trains.

source: Dans les trains-couchettes qui roulent de nuit, les passeports peuvent être collectés par le chef de train afin de ne pas interrompre votre sommeil.
reference: On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.
translation: French text: In the train-couchettes that run at night, passports can be collected by the conductor so that you do not interrupt your sleep.

source: L’enregistrement est une exigence supplémentaire pour la procédure de visa. Dans certains pays, vous devez vous faire enregistrer et indiquer l’adresse de votre lieu de séjour auprès des autorités locales.
reference: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities.
translation: French text: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register and provide your address to local authorities.

source: Cela peut nécessiter de remplir un formulaire auprès de la police locale ou une visite aux bureaux de l'immigration.
reference: This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices.
translation: This may require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices.

source: Dans beaucoup de pays disposant d'une telle loi, les hôtels locaux s'occuperont eux-mêmes de l'enregistrement (n'oubliez pas de demander).
reference: In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask).
translation: French text: In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask).

source: Dans d'autres cas, seules les personnes résidant hors hébergements touristiques doivent s'enregistrer. Toutefois, la loi est beaucoup plus obscure, donc il conviendra de se renseigner au préalable.
reference: In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.
translation: French text: In other cases, only those staying outside tourist accommodations need to register. However, the law is much more obscure, so it is advisable to check first.

source: L'architecture se rapporte à la conception et à la construction des bâtiments. L'architecture d'un site est souvent une attraction touristique à part entière.
reference: Architecture is concerned with the design and construction of buildings. The architecture of a place is often a tourist attraction in its own right.
translation: French text: Architecture is concerned with the design and construction of buildings. The architecture of a site is often a tourist attraction in its own right.

source: De nombreux bâtiments sont plutôt agréables à regarder, et la vue qu'offrent les grands bâtiments ou des fenêtres savamment placées peut être d'une beauté saisissante.
reference: Many buildings are quite beautiful to look at and the view from a tall building or from a cleverly-positioned window can be a beauty to behold.
translation: French text: Many buildings are rather beautiful to look at, and the view from tall buildings or cleverly-positioned windows can be breathtaking.

source: L’architecture recoupe considérablement d’autres domaines, notamment l’urbanisme, le génie civil, les arts décoratifs, la décoration intérieure et l’aménagement paysager.
reference: Architecture overlaps considerably with other fields including urban planning, civil engineering, decorative arts, interior design and landscape design.
translation: French text: Architecture overlaps considerably with other fields, including urban planning, civil engineering, decorative arts, interior design, and landscape design.

source: Étant donné l’éloignement de nombreux pueblos, vous ne pourrez pas trouver une vie nocturne importante sans vous rendre à Albuquerque ou à Santa Fe.
reference: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe.
translation: Note: Due to the distance between many pueblos, you will not find a large nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe.

source: Toutefois, presque tous les casinos cités ci-dessus servent des boissons, et plusieurs d'entre eux proposent des distractions de haute qualité (principalement les grands casinos situés à proximité d'Albuquerque et de Santa Fe)
reference: However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe).
translation: However, almost all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them offer high-quality entertainment (primarily the large casinos located near Albuquerque and Santa Fe).

source: Méfiez-vous : les bars des petites villes ici ne sont pas toujours de bons endroits pour traîner si vous êtes visiteur étranger.
reference: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out.
translation: Note: Beware of small-town bars here, which are not always good places to hang out if you're a tourist.

source: D'une part, le nord du Nouveau-Mexique connaît des problèmes importants de conduite en état d'ivresse, et la concentration de conducteurs en état d'ébriété est élevée à proximité des bars des petites villes.
reference: For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
translation: First, the north of New Mexico has serious problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of drunk drivers is high near bars in small towns.

source: Les peintures murales ou les gribouillages indésirables sont connus sous le nom de graffitis.
reference: Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti.
translation: French text: Unwanted murals or graffiti is known as graffiti.

source: Bien que ce soit loin d'être un phénomène moderne, la plupart des gens l'associent probablement au fait que des jeunes vandalisent des propriétés publiques et privées en utilisant de la peinture en aérosol.
reference: While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint.
translation: French text: Although this is far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with young people vandalizing public and private property with spray paint.

source: Il existe toutefois aujourd'hui des graffeurs reconnus, des événements consacrés à la discipline et des surfaces « autorisées » pour s'y adonner. Dans ces conditions, les graffitis ressemblent plus souvent à de véritables œuvres d'art qu'à de vulgaires tags indéchiffrables.
reference: However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and "legal" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags.
translation: There are, however, today recognized graffiti artists, graffiti events and surfaces "allowed" to be graffitied. In these circumstances, graffiti looks more like artwork than illegible tags.

source: Le lancer de Boomerang est une compétence populaire que de nombreux touristes veulent acquérir.
reference: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire.
translation: French text: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire.

source: Si vous voulez apprendre à lancer un boomerang qui vous retourne directement dans la main, alors assurez-vous de bien avoir un boomerang conçu pour revenir.
reference: If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning.
translation: French text: If you want to learn how to throw a boomerang that will return to your hand, then make sure you have a boomerang that will return.

source: En réalité, la plupart des boomerangs disponibles en Australie ne reviennent pas. Il est préférable pour les débutants de ne pas essayer de faire de lancers dans le vent.
reference: Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy
translation: French text: In fact, most boomerangs available in Australia don't come back. It is better for beginners not to try throwing in the wind.

source: On cuit un repas hangi dans une fosse chaude creusée dans le sol.
reference: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground.
translation: French text: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit dug in the ground.

source: La fosse est soit chauffée avec des pierres chaudes provenant d'un feu, soit la chaleur géothermique réchauffe naturellement certaines zones du sol.
reference: The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot.
translation: French text: The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or geothermal heat naturally warms certain areas of the ground.

source: Le hangi est souvent utilisé pour préparer un dîner traditionnel de type rôti.
reference: The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner.
translation: The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast dinner.

source: Plusieurs endroits à Rotorua offrent des hangis géothermiques, tandis que d’autres hangis peuvent être échantillonnés à Christchurch, Wellington et ailleurs.
reference: Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
translation: French text: Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while others can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

source: MetroRail propose deux classes dans les trains de banlieue du Cap et de ses environs : MetroPlus (également appelée première classe) et Metro (appelée troisième classe).
reference: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class).
translation: MetroRail offers two classes on the MetroRail trains in Cape Town and its environs: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class).

source: MetroPlus est plus confortable et moins bondé, mais plus cher, tout en restant moins cher que le tarif normal des billets de métro en Europe.
reference: MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe.
translation: MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded, but more expensive, but still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe.

source: Chaque train dispose de wagons Metro et MetroPlus ; les wagons MetroPlus sont toujours en bout du train le plus proche du Cap.
reference: Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
translation: French text: Every train has Metro and MetroPlus carriages; MetroPlus carriages are always at the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

source: Porter pour les autres – ne perdez jamais vos sacs de vue, surtout lorsque vous traversez des frontières internationales.
reference: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders.
translation: French text: Bring for others - Never lose your bags of sight, especially when you cross international borders.

source: Quelqu'un pourrait se servir de vous pour transporter de la drogue à votre insu, ce qui vous attirerait de gros ennuis.
reference: You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble.
translation: French text: Someone could use you to transport drugs without your knowledge, which will lead to big trouble for you.

source: Cela inclut l'attente en ligne, car les chiens renifleurs de drogue peuvent être utilisés à tout moment sans préavis.
reference: This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice.
translation: French text: This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs can be used at any time without notice.

source: Dans certains pays, les sanctions sont extrêmement draconiennes, même pour les premières infractions ; elles peuvent aller jusqu'à des peines de prison de plus de dix ans ou la peine de mort.
reference: Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death.
translation: French text: In some countries, the penalties are extremely draconian, even for first-time offenses; they can include prison sentences of more than ten years or death.

source: Les sacs sans surveillance sont une cible pour le vol et peuvent également attirer l'attention des autorités qui se méfient des alertes à la bombe.
reference: Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
translation: French text: Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract the attention of authorities who are wary of bomb alerts.

source: À la maison, en raison de cette exposition constante aux germes locaux, les chances sont très élevées que vous soyez déjà immunisé contre eux.
reference: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them.
translation: French text: At home, due to this constant exposure to local germs, the chances are very high that you are already immune to them.

source: Mais dans d'autres parties du monde, où la faune bactériologique est nouvelle pour vous, vous risquez bien plus de rencontrer des problèmes.
reference: But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems.
translation: French text: But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna is new to you, you are much more likely to run into problems.

source: De plus, dans les climats plus chauds, les bactéries se développent plus rapidement et survivent plus longtemps à l'extérieur du corps.
reference: Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body.
translation: In addition, in warmer climates, bacteria grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body.

source: Ainsi les fléaux de Delhi Belly, la malédiction du pharaon, la vengeance de Montezuma et leurs nombreux amis.
reference: Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends.
translation: The curse of Delhi Belly, Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends.

source: Comme pour les problèmes respiratoires dans les climats plus froids, les problèmes intestinaux dans les climats chauds sont assez courants et, dans la plupart des cas, sont particulièrement gênants mais pas vraiment dangereux.
reference: As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
translation: French text: As for respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and, in most cases, are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

source: Si vous voyagez pour la première fois dans un pays en voie de développement ou dans une région du monde que vous ne connaissez pas, ne prenez pas le possible choc culturel à le légère.
reference: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock.
translation: French text: If traveling in a developing country or in a new part of the world for the first time, don't underestimate the possible cultural shock.

source: Nombreux sont les voyageurs stables et compétents qui ont été dépassés par la nouveauté des voyages dans les pays en développement, où de nombreux petits ajustements culturels peuvent vite s'accumuler.
reference: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly.
translation: French text: Many stable, capable travelers have been overcome by the newness of traveling in developing countries, where many small cultural adjustments can quickly accumulate.

source: Surtout au début, pensez à faire des folies dans les hôtels, la nourriture et les services de style et de qualité occidentaux pour vous aider à vous acclimater.
reference: Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize.
translation: French text: Especially in the beginning, think about splurging on Western-style hotels, food and services to help acclimate.

source: Ne dormez pas sur un matelas ou sur un coussin à même le sol dans les zones où vous ne connaissez pas la faune locale.
reference: Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna.
translation: French text: Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna.

source: Si vous allez camper, apportez un lit de camp ou un hamac pour vous tenir à l'écart des serpents, scorpions et autres.
reference: If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
translation: French text: If you are going to camp, bring a tent or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and other things.

source: Emplissez votre maison avec l'arôme d'un café intense le matin et le soir, avec celui d'une relaxante tisane à la camomille.
reference: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night.
translation: French text: Fill your home with the aroma of a strong coffee in the morning and a relaxing chamomile tea at night.

source: Lorsque vous êtes en séjour, vous avez le temps de vous faire plaisir et de prendre quelques minutes supplémentaires pour préparer quelque chose de spécial.
reference: When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special.
translation: French text: When you're on vacation, you have time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to make something special.

source: Si vous vous sentez d'humeur plus aventureuse, profitez de l'occasion pour préparer un jus ou mélanger des smoothies :
reference: If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies:
translation: French text: If you feel more adventurous, take advantage of the opportunity to prepare a juice or mix up some smoothies:

source: peut-être découvrirez-vous une boisson simple que vous pourrez préparer pour votre petit déjeuner lorsque vous retournerez à votre routine quotidienne.
reference: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine.
translation: French text: maybe you'll find a simple drink you can make for breakfast when you return to your daily routine.

source: Si vous vivez dans une ville où la culture de la boisson est variée, allez dans les bars ou les pubs des quartiers que vous ne fréquentez pas.
reference: If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
translation: French text: If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

source: Pour ceux qui ne connaissent pas bien le jargon médical, les mots « infectieux » et « contagieux » ont un sens distinct.
reference: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings.
translation: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings.

source: Une maladie infectieuse est celle causée par un agent pathogène, tel qu'un virus, une bactérie, un champignon ou d’autres parasites.
reference: An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites.
translation: French text: A contagious disease is one caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus, or other parasites.

source: Une maladie contagieuse est une maladie facilement transmissible lorsqu’on se trouve à proximité d’une personne infectée.
reference: A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person.
translation: French text: A contagious disease is a disease easily transmitted when in close contact with an infected person.

source: De nombreux gouvernements exigent que les visiteurs qui entrent dans leur pays ou les résidents qui le quittent soient vaccinés contre toute une série de maladies.
reference: Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases.
translation: French text: Many governments require visitors entering their country or residents leaving it to be vaccinated against a range of diseases.

source: Ces exigences peuvent souvent dépendre des pays visités par un voyageur, ou qu'il compte visiter.
reference: These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.
translation: French text: These requirements can often depend on the countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

source: Un des points forts de Charlotte, en Caroline du Nord, est l'abondance des services de haute qualité pour les familles.
reference: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families.
translation: Charlotte, North Carolina, is one of the best places in the country for families.

source: Les résidents d’autres régions citent souvent la convivialité familiale comme raison principale de leur installation, et les visiteurs trouvent souvent la ville facile à apprécier avec des enfants à côté.
reference: Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around.
translation: French text: Residents from other regions often cite family friendliness as the main reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around.

source: Au cours des 20 dernières années, le nombre d'options adaptées aux enfants dans le quartier des affaires de Charlotte a connu une croissance exponentielle.
reference: In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially.
translation: French text: In the past 20 years, the number of child-friendly options in the Charlotte business district has grown exponentially.

source: En général, les familles n’utilisent pas de taxis à Charlotte, bien que ces derniers puissent se révéler utiles dans certaines circonstances.
reference: Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances.
translation: French text: In general, families don't use taxis in Charlotte, although they can be useful in certain circumstances.

source: Il y a une surtaxe pour avoir plus de deux passagers, donc cette option pourrait être plus coûteuse qu'indispensable.
reference: There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
translation: French text: There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

source: L’Antarctique, qui entoure le pôle Sud, est l’endroit le plus froid sur Terre.
reference: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.
translation: French text: Antarctica, which surrounds the South Pole, is the coldest place on Earth.

source: Les visites touristiques sont coûteuses, exigent une bonne condition physique, ne peuvent avoir lieu qu'en été (de novembre à février) et sont largement limitées à la péninsule, aux îles, et à la mer de Ross.
reference: Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea.
translation: French text: Tourist visits are expensive, require good physical condition, can only take place in the summer (November to February), and are largely limited to the Peninsula, the Islands, and Ross Sea.

source: Quelques milliers d'employés vivent ici en été dans une quarantaine de bases, principalement dans ces régions ; un petit nombre d'entre eux restent en hiver.
reference: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter.
translation: French text: A few thousand employees live here in summer in a couple of dozen bases, mostly in these regions; a few stay in winter.

source: L'Antarctique intérieur est un plateau désolé recouvert de 2 à 3 km de glace.
reference: Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice.
translation: French text: The interior of Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice.

source: Expéditions aériennes spécifiques et ponctuelles vers l’intérieur des terres, pour l’alpinisme ou pour atteindre le Pôle, disposant d’une vaste base.
reference: Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
translation: French text: Aircraft specific and punctual missions to the interior of the country, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, with a large base.

source: L'autoroute du pôle Sud est une route de 1 600 km entre la station de McMurdo, au bord de la mer de Ross, et le pôle.
reference: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole.
translation: French text: The South Pole Traverse is a 1600 km road between McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea and the Pole.

source: Il s'agit de neige compactée, avec des crevasses comblées et marquées par des fanions. Il ne peut être parcouru que par des tracteurs spécialisés, tirant des traîneaux transportant carburant et fournitures.
reference: It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies.
translation: French text: This is compacted snow, with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies.

source: Ces derniers ne sont pas très agiles, de sorte que la piste doit faire une longue embardée autour des montagnes transantarctiques pour arriver sur le plateau.
reference: These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
translation: French text: These aren't very agile, so the trail has to make a long curve around the Transantarctic Mountains to get to the plateau.

source: En hiver, la cause d’accidents la plus fréquente est le caractère glissant des routes, des trottoirs et surtout des marches.
reference: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps.
translation: French text: In winter, the most common cause of accidents is slippery roads, pavements and especially steps.

source: Des chaussures avec des semelles adéquates, c'est le minimum. Les chaussures d'été glissent très souvent sur la glace et sur la neige, même certains modèles prévus pour l'hiver n'y dérogent pas.
reference: At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient.
translation: French text: Wearing the right shoes is the minimum. Summer shoes often slide on ice and snow, even some winter shoes.

source: Le motif doit être suffisamment profond, soit 5 mm (1/5 po) ou plus, et le matériau doit être suffisamment souple par temps froid.
reference: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures.
translation: French text: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material should be soft enough in cold weather.

source: Certaines bottes sont munies de crampons et il existe un équipement complémentaire à crampons pour les conditions glissantes, qui convient à la plupart des chaussures et des bottes, pour les talons ou les talons et la semelle.
reference: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole.
translation: French text: Some boots have studs and there is an accessory for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole.

source: Les talons doivent être bas et larges. Du sable, du gravier ou du sel (chlorure de calcium) est souvent dispersé sur les routes ou les chemins pour améliorer la traction.
reference: Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
translation: French text: Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

source: Les avalanches ne sont pas des phénomènes anormaux ; les pentes escarpées ne peuvent retenir qu'une petite quantité de neige, dont l'excédent se répand sous forme d'avalanche.
reference: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches.
translation: French text: Avalanches are not abnormal phenomena; steep slopes can only hold a small amount of snow, which will overflow and form an avalanche.

source: Le problème est que la neige colle, alors si elle s'effondre, c'est qu'il y a eu un élément déclencheur. Or, un léger effondrement de la neige peut être le déclencheur pour tout le reste.
reference: The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest.
translation: The problem is that snow sticks, so if it falls, it will stick. A little falling snow can be the trigger for the rest.
