source: Parfois, l'élément déclencheur est le réchauffement solaire sur la neige, parfois c'est juste davantage de neige, et d'autres fois il peut s'agir d'événements naturels ou de l'activité humaine.
reference: Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
translation: French text: Sometimes the trigger is the sun warming the snow, sometimes it's just more snow, and sometimes it's natural events or human activity.

source: Une tornade est un tourbillon d'air à basse-pression en forme de colonne, l'air alentour est aspiré vers l'intérieur et le haut.
reference: A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward.
translation: French text: A tornado is a spinning column of low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward.

source: Ils génèrent des vents violents (souvent de 100 à 200 miles/heure) et peuvent soulever des objets lourds dans les airs, les transportant au fur et à mesure que la tornade se déplace.
reference: They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves.
translation: French text: They generate violent winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves.

source: Elles commencent comme des entonnoirs descendant des nuages orageux, et deviennent des « tornades » lorsqu’elles touchent terre.
reference: They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground.
translation: French text: They start out like funnels descending from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they touch down.

source: Les fournisseurs de VPN (réseau privé virtuel) personnels sont un excellent moyen de contourner à la fois la censure politique et le géofiltrage IP commercial.
reference: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering.
translation: French text: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are a great way to circumvent both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering.

source: Ils sont supérieurs aux proxy web pour plusieurs raisons : ils redirigent tout le trafic en ligne, pas seulement le http.
reference: They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http.
translation: French text: They are superior to proxy web for several reasons: They redirect all online traffic, not only http.

source: Ils offrent normalement une plus grande largeur de bande et une meilleure qualité de service. Elles sont cryptées et donc plus difficiles à espionner.
reference: They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
translation: French text: They normally offer a wider bandwidth and better service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

source: Les entreprises de médias mentent couramment sur l'objectif de cette mesure, prétendant qu'elle vise à « empêcher le piratage ».
reference: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy".
translation: French text: Media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this measure, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy".

source: En fait, les codes régionaux n'ont absolument aucun effet sur la copie illégale; une copie bit à bit d'un disque fonctionne très bien sur n'importe quel appareil où l'original peut être joué.
reference: In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will.
translation: French text: In fact, regional codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk works fine on any device where the original can be played.

source: Le but réel est de donner à ces entreprises un plus grand contrôle sur leurs marchés ; il s’agit de gagner de l’argent.
reference: The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning.
translation: French text: The real goal is to give these companies more control over their markets; it is all about making money.

source: Les appels étant acheminés par l'internet, vous n'avez pas besoin d'utiliser une compagnie de téléphone située où vous vivez ou où vous voyagez.
reference: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel.
translation: French text: Calls are routed over the Internet, so you don't need to use a phone company based where you live or where you travel.

source: Il n’est pas non plus obligatoire d’obtenir un numéro local de la collectivité dans laquelle vous vivez; vous pouvez obtenir une connexion Internet par satellite dans les contrées sauvages de Chicken, en Alaska, et sélectionner un numéro qui indique que vous êtes dans l’Arizona ensoleillée.
reference: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona.
translation: French text: It is not necessary to obtain a local telephone number from the community in which you live; you can obtain Internet access via satellite in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number that indicates that you are in the sunny Arizona.

source: Souvent, il vous faut acheter un numéro international qui autorise les appels en RCTP. L'endroit où votre numéro de téléphone est localisé est déterminant pour les personnes qui vous appellent.
reference: Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
translation: French text: Often, you have to buy an international number that allows PSTN calls. The place where your phone number is located is very important for people calling you.

source: Les applications de traduction en temps réel sont des applis capable de traduire automatiquement des segments entiers de texte, ceci d'une langue vers une autre.
reference: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another.
translation: Real-time translation apps are apps that can automatically translate whole segments of text, from one language to another.

source: Certaines des applications de cette catégorie peuvent même traduire des textes en langue étrangère inscrits sur des panneaux ou d'autres objets du quotidien lorsque l'utilisateur pointe son smartphone vers eux.
reference: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects.
translation: French text: Some of the apps in this category can even translate texts written on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points his smartphone at them.

source: Les moteurs de traduction se sont considérablement améliorés, et donnent maintenant souvent des traductions plus ou moins correctes (et plus rarement du charabia), mais il faut faire attention, car ils ont peut-être encore tout faux.
reference: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong.
translation: French text: The translation engines have greatly improved, and now often give fairly correct translations (and less often gibberish), but be careful, as they may still be completely wrong.

source: L'une des applications les plus réputées dans cette catégorie est Google Translate, qui permet de traduire hors ligne après avoir téléchargé les données linguistiques souhaitées.
reference: One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
translation: French text: One of the most popular apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

source: L'utilisation d'applications de navigation par GPS sur votre smartphone peut être le moyen le plus simple et le plus pratique pour vos déplacements en dehors de votre pays de résidence.
reference: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country.
translation: French text: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to travel outside your country of residence.

source: Il peut permettre d’économiser de l’argent en achetant de nouvelles cartes pour un GPS ou un appareil GPS autonome, ou bien en en louant un auprès d’une société de location de voitures.
reference: It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company.
translation: French text: It can save money by buying new maps for a GPS or a GPS device or by renting one from a car rental company.

source: Si vous n’avez pas de connexion de données sur votre téléphone, ou s’il est hors de portée, ses performances peuvent être limitées ou indisponibles.
reference: If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
translation: French text: If you don't have a data connection on your phone, or if it is out of range, its performance may be limited or unavailable.

source: Chaque magasin du coin est rempli d'une panoplie déroutante de cartes téléphoniques prépayées qui peuvent être utilisées à partir de téléphones payants ou de téléphones ordinaires.
reference: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones.
translation: French text: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary phones.

source: Si la plupart des cartes permettent d'appeler partout, certaines sont spécialisées dans l'offre de tarifs avantageux pour des groupes de pays spécifiques.
reference: While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries.
translation: French text: While most cards can call anywhere, some specialize in providing favourable call rates for specific groups of countries.

source: L’accès à ces services se fait souvent par le biais d’un numéro de téléphone gratuit qui peut être appelé sans frais depuis presque tous les téléphones.
reference: Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
translation: French text: Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from almost any telephone.

source: Les règles concernant la photographie régulière s'appliquent également à l'enregistrement vidéo, voire même davantage.
reference: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so.
translation: French text: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, even more so.

source: S'il est interdit de prendre une simple photo de quelque chose, il ne faut même pas penser à en enregistrer une vidéo.
reference: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it.
translation: French text: If it's not allowed to take a simple photo of something, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it.

source: Si vous utilisez un drone, vérifiez bien à l'avance ce que vous êtes autorisé à filmer et quels permis ou licences supplémentaires sont nécessaires.
reference: If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required.
translation: French text: If you are using a drone, make sure you check in advance what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required.

source: Faire voler un drone près d’un aéroport ou au-dessus d’une foule est presque toujours une mauvaise idée, même si ce n’est pas illégal dans votre région.
reference: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
translation: French text: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

source: De nos jours, il est rare que les gens réservent leur vol directement via la compagnie aérienne sans avoir préalablement recherché et comparé les prix.
reference: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices.
translation: French text: Today, it's rare that people book their flights directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices.

source: Un même vol peut parfois présenter de grandes disparités tarifaires entre les agrégateurs ; avant de réserver, il est donc avantageux de comparer les résultats des recherches ainsi que de consulter le site web de la compagnie aérienne elle-même.
reference: Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
translation: French text: Sometimes the same flight can have huge differences in prices between agregators; before booking, it is therefore advisable to compare the results of the search and to visit the airline's website itself.

source: Si vous n’avez pas besoin de visa pour des séjours de courte durée dans certains pays en tant que touriste ou pour le voyage d'affaires, le fait d’y aller en tant qu’étudiant étranger nécessite généralement un séjour plus long que celui d’un simple touriste.
reference: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist.
translation: French text: If you don't need a visa for short stays in certain countries as a tourist or for business travel, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a tourist.

source: En général, pour séjourner dans un pays étranger sur une longue période, vous devez obtenir au préalable un visa.
reference: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance.
translation: French text: Generally speaking, to stay in a foreign country for a long period of time, you must obtain a visa in advance.

source: Les procédures de demande et exigences en matière de visas étudiants sont généralement différentes de celles des visas standard de tourisme ou d'affaires.
reference: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas.
translation: French text: Student visas and requirements are generally different from standard tourist or business visas.

source: Pour la plupart des pays, vous aurez besoin d’une lettre d'acceptation de l’établissement dans lequel vous souhaitez étudier, ainsi que d’une preuve de fonds suffisants pour subvenir à vos besoins au moins pendant la première année de votre cursus.
reference: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course.
translation: French text: For most countries, you will need an acceptance letter from the institution you wish to study at, and evidence of funds to support yourself at least for the first year of your course.

source: Pour le détail des conditions, voyez auprès de l’établissement ainsi que du service d’immigration du pays dans lequel vous souhaitez étudier.
reference: Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
translation: French text: For detailed information, see the institution and the immigration department of the country you wish to study in.

source: À moins que vous ne soyez un diplomate, travailler à l’étranger signifie généralement que vous devrez remplir la déclaration d’impôts sur le revenu dans le pays où vous êtes basé.
reference: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in.
translation: French text: Unless you are a diplomat, working abroad generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country where you are based.

source: L'impôt sur le revenu est structuré différemment dans différents pays, et les taux d'imposition et les tranches d'imposition varient largement d'un pays à l'autre.
reference: Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another.
translation: French text: The tax system is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another.

source: Dans certains pays fédéraux tels que les États-Unis et le Canada, l'impôt sur le revenu est prélevé à la fois au niveau fédéral et au niveau local, de sorte que les taux et les tranches d'imposition peuvent varier d'une région à l'autre.
reference: In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
translation: French text: In some federal countries such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal and local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

source: Alors que le contrôle de l'immigration est généralement absent ou constitue une formalité à l'arrivée dans votre pays d'origine, le contrôle douanier peut être une source de tracas.
reference: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle.
translation: French text: While immigration control is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your home country, customs control can be a hassle.

source: Assurez-vous de savoir ce que vous pouvez et ne pouvez pas apporter, et déclarez tout ce qui dépasse les limites légales.
reference: Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
translation: French text: Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in, and declare anything over the legal limits.

source: Le moyen le plus simple de se lancer dans la rédaction d’articles de voyage est de se perfectionner sur un blogue de voyage bien établi.
reference: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website.
translation: French text: The easiest way to get started in travel writing is to hone your skills on a well-established travel blog.

source: Après, et seulement après avoir maîtrisé le formatage et la révision en ligne, vous pourrez créer votre propre site internet.
reference: After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
translation: Next: and only after you have mastered formatting and editing online, you can create your own website.

source: Le bénévolat en voyage est un excellent moyen de faire une différence, mais il ne s’agit pas seulement de donner.
reference: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving.
translation: French text: Volunteering while travelling is an excellent way to make a difference, but it is not just about giving.

source: Vivre et faire du bénévolat dans un pays étranger est une excellente façon de découvrir une culture différente, de rencontrer de nouvelles personnes, d'apprendre à se connaître soi-même, à acquérir de nouvelles perspectives et même de nouvelles compétences.
reference: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills.
translation: French text: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is an excellent way to discover a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, gain new perspectives and even new skills.

source: Cela peut également être un bon moyen d'étirer un budget pour permettre un séjour plus long quelque part, car de nombreux emplois de bénévoles offrent le gîte et le couvert et certains versent un petit salaire.
reference: It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
translation: French text: This can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere, as many volunteer jobs provide lodging and a small salary.

source: Les Vikings ont utilisé les voies navigables russes pour atteindre la mer Noire et la mer Caspienne. Certaines parties de ces itinéraires peuvent toujours être utilisées. Vérifiez la nécessité éventuelle de permis spéciaux, qui peuvent être difficiles à obtenir.
reference: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get.
translation: French text: Vikings used Russian waterways to reach the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check whether special permits are needed, which can be difficult to obtain.

source: Le canal de la mer Blanche relie l'océan Arctique à la mer Baltique, via le lac Onega, le lac Ladoga et Saint-Pétersbourg, passant principalement par les rivières et les lacs.
reference: The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes.
translation: The White Sea Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes.

source: Le lac Onega est également relié à la Volga, de sorte qu'il est encore possible de venir de la mer Caspienne en passant par la Russie.
reference: Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
translation: The Onega Lake is also connected to the Volga, so it is still possible to come from the Caspian Sea through Russia.

source: Rassurez-vous : une fois que vous aurez atteint les ports de plaisance, tout sera clair. Vous rencontrerez d'autres auto-stoppeurs, qui vous feront part de leurs informations.
reference: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you.
translation: French text: Be assured: once you reach the marinas, everything will be clear. You will meet other auto-stoppeurs, who will share their information with you.

source: Fondamentalement, vous afficherez des annonces pour proposer votre aide, arpenterez les quais, aborderez les personnes nettoyant leurs yachts, essayerez de faire connaissance avec des navigateurs au bar, etc.
reference: Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc.
translation: French text: Basically, you will be putting up notices to offer your help, walking the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make friends with sailors at the bar, etc.

source: Essayez de parler au plus grand nombre de personnes possible. Au bout d’un certain temps, tout le monde vous connaîtra et vous donnera des indications sur le bateau qui cherche quelqu’un.
reference: Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
translation: French text: Try to speak to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints about the boat that is looking for someone.

source: Vous devez choisir avec soin votre compagnie aérienne Frequent Flyer dans le cadre d'une alliance.
reference: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully.
translation: French text: You should choose carefully your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance.

source: Même si vous pensez qu’il est intuitif de rejoindre la compagnie aérienne avec laquelle vous voyagez le plus, vous devez savoir que les privilèges offerts sont souvent différents et que le système de points de fidélité peut être plus généreux avec une autre compagnie de la même alliance.
reference: Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
translation: French text: Although you may think it intuitive to join the airline with which you fly the most, you should know that privileges offered are often different and that frequent flyer points can be more generous with another airline in the same alliance.

source: Les compagnies aériennes telles que Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways et Turkish Airlines ont grandement développé leur offres en Afrique, et offrent des liaisons vers les villes africaines majeures à des tarifs compétitifs comparés aux autres compagnies aériennes européennes.
reference: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines.
translation: French text: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services in Africa, and offer connections to major African cities at competitive rates compared to other European airlines.

source: En 2014 la compagnie Turkish Airlines dessert 39 destinations dans 30 pays d'Afrique.
reference: Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014.
translation: Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries in 2014.

source: Si vous avez plus de temps pour voyager, comparez le prix total du billet vers l'Afrique avec le prix d'un billet pour faire le tour du monde.
reference: If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare.
translation: French text: If you have more time to travel, compare the total cost of the trip to Africa with the total cost of the trip around the world.

source: N'oubliez pas d'ajouter les frais supplémentaires de visas, de taxes de départ, de transport terrestre, etc. pour tous ces endroits en dehors de l'Afrique.
reference: Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
translation: Note: Don't forget to add in additional visa, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

source: Si vous voulez faire le tour du monde en avion en restant uniquement dans l'hémisphère sud, le choix des vols et des destinations sera limité à cause du manque de routes transocéaniques.
reference: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes.
translation: French text: If you want to fly around the world in a plane only in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations will be limited because of the lack of transoceanic routes.

source: Il n’existe aucune alliance de compagnies aériennes couvrant les jonctions des trois océans de l’hémisphère sud (et SkyTeam ne couvre aucune d’entre elles).
reference: No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings).
translation: French text: There is no alliance of airlines covering the crossings of the three oceans of the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of them).

source: Cependant, Star Alliance couvre tout sauf le Pacifique Sud oriental de Santiago du Chili à Tahiti, qui est un vol LATAM Oneworld.
reference: However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight.
translation: However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight.

source: Ce vol n’est pas la seule option si vous voulez éviter le Pacifique Sud et la côte ouest de l’Amérique du Sud. (voir ci-dessous)
reference: This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
translation: French text: This flight is not the only option if you want to avoid the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

source: En 1994, la région azerbaïdjanaise du Haut-Karabakh, ethniquement arménienne, a mené une guerre contre les Azéris.
reference: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris.
translation: 1994: The Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh region, ethnically Armenian, fought against the Azeris.

source: Avec le soutien de l'Arménie, une nouvelle république a été créée. Cependant, aucune nation établie, pas même l'Arménie, ne la reconnaît officiellement.
reference: With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it.
translation: French text: With the support of Armenia, a new republic was created. However, no established nation, not even Armenia, officially recognizes it.

source: Les incidents diplomatiques sur la région continuent d'entacher les relations entre l'Arménie et l'Azerbaïdjan.
reference: Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
translation: French text: Diplomatic incidents continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

source: Le quartier du canal (Grachtengordel en néerlandais) est le célèbre quartier du XVIIe siècle qui entoure la Binnenstad d'Amsterdam.
reference: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam.
translation: Dutch text: The canal district (Grachtengordel in Dutch) is the famous 17th century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam.

source: Tout le quartier est inscrit au patrimoine mondial de l'UNESCO pour sa valeur culturelle et historique unique, et les prix de l'immobilier y sont parmi les plus élevés du pays.
reference: The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
translation: French text: The whole neighborhood is listed on UNESCO's world heritage list for its unique cultural and historical value, and the property prices are among the highest in the country.

source: Cinque Terre, qui signifie Cinq Terres, comprend les cinq petits villages côtiers de Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza et Monterosso dans la région italienne de la Ligurie.
reference: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria.
translation: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso in the Italian region of Liguria.

source: Ils sont inscrits sur la liste du patrimoine mondial de l’UNESCO.
reference: They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.
translation: They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.

source: Au fil des siècles, les gens ont soigneusement construit des terrasses sur le paysage accidenté et escarpé jusqu'aux falaises qui surplombent la mer.
reference: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
translation: French text: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged landscape and steep cliffs overlooking the sea.

source: Une partie de son charme réside dans l'absence de développement visible des entreprises. Des chemins, des trains et des bateaux relient les villages, et les voitures en provenance de l'extérieur ne peuvent y accéder.
reference: Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
translation: French text: Part of its charm is the lack of visible development of the companies. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars from outside cannot reach them.

source: Les variantes du français pratiquées en Belgique et en Suisse diffèrent légèrement du français parlé en France, bien qu'elles soient suffisamment similaires pour être mutuellement intelligibles.
reference: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible.
translation: French text: The varieties of French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are sufficiently similar to be mutually intelligible.

source: Le système de numérotation de la Belgique et de la Suisse francophones présente notamment quelques petites particularités qui diffèrent du français parlé en France, et la prononciation de certains mots est légèrement différente.
reference: In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.
translation: French text: The numbering system in Belgium and Switzerland francophones is somewhat different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.

source: Néanmoins, tous les Belges et les Suisses francophones auraient appris le français standard à l'école, de sorte qu'ils seraient en mesure de vous comprendre même si vous utilisiez le système de numérotation français standard.
reference: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
translation: However, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French at school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

source: Dans de nombreuses régions du monde, faire un signe de la main est un geste amical signifiant « bonjour ».
reference: In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating "hello."
translation: French text: In many parts of the world, making a handshake is a friendly gesture, meaning "hello."

source: En revanche, en Malaisie, du moins chez les Malais des zones rurales, cela signifie « viens par ici », comme le fait de plier l'index vers soi, geste utilisé dans certains pays occidentaux, et il ne devrait être utilisé qu'en ce sens.
reference: However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come over," similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose.
translation: In Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come over here," as in the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture used in some Western countries, and should only be used in that direction.

source: De même, un voyageur britannique en Espagne pourrait confondre un signe d'adieu fait par une personne qui tourne la paume de sa main vers elle-même (plutôt que vers la personne à qui elle adresse le signe) avec une invitation à revenir.
reference: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back.
translation: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave from a stranger (rather than a friend) as an invitation to return.

source: Les langues auxiliaires sont des langues, artificielles ou construites, créées dans le but de faciliter la communication entre des peuples qui, autrement, auraient des difficultés à communiquer.
reference: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating.
translation: French text: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the purpose of facilitating communication between peoples who otherwise would have difficulty communicating.

source: Elles sont distinctes des langues véhiculaires, qui sont des langues naturelles ou organiques qui deviennent dominantes pour une raison ou une autre en tant que moyen de communication entre les locuteurs d'autres langues.
reference: They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
translation: French: Elles sont distinctes des langues véhiculaires, qui sont des langues naturelles ou organiques qui deviennent dominantes pour une raison ou une autre en tant que moyen de communication entre les locuteurs d'autres langues.

source: Avec la chaleur de la journée, les voyageurs peuvent apercevoir des mirages qui donnent l'illusion de l'eau (ou d'autres choses).
reference: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things).
translation: French text: With the heat of the day, travelers can see mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things).

source: Celles-ci peuvent être dangereuses si le voyageur poursuit le mirage, gaspillant ainsi une énergie précieuse et l’eau restante.
reference: These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water.
translation: French text: These can be dangerous if the traveler pursues the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water.

source: Même le plus chaud des déserts peut devenir extrêmement froid la nuit. L'hypothermie est un risque réel si vous n'avez pas de vêtements chauds.
reference: Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
translation: French text: Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk if you don't have warm clothing.

source: C'est surtout en été qu'il vous faudra faire attention aux moustiques si vous comptez faire de la randonnée en forêt tropicale.
reference: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest.
translation: French text: It's especially important to take care of mosquitos if you plan to hike in the rainforest in the summer.

source: Même si vous conduisez dans la forêt tropicale, quelques secondes avec les portes ouvertes pendant que vous montez dans le véhicule suffisent pour que les moustiques montent dans le véhicule avec vous.
reference: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
translation: French text: Even if you drive through the tropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you are getting in the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

source: La grippe aviaire, ou de manière plus formelle l'influenza aviaire, peut infecter à la fois les oiseaux et les mammifères.
reference: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals.
translation: French text: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals.

source: Moins d'un millier de cas ont été rapportés chez les humains, mais certains ont été mortels.
reference: Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal.
translation: French text: Less than a thousand cases have been reported in humans, but some have been fatal.

source: La plupart impliquaient des personnes qui travaillent avec des volailles, mais il existe également un certain risque pour les observateurs d'oiseaux.
reference: Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
translation: French text: Most involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

source: Les fjords et les vallées escarpées qui cèdent soudainement la place à un haut plateau plus ou moins régulier sont typiques de la Norvège.
reference: Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau.
translation: French text: The fjords and steep valleys that suddenly give way to a more or less even plateau are typical of Norway.

source: Ces plateaux sont souvent appelés « vidde », pour désigner un vaste espace sans arbre, une étendue sans limites.
reference: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse.
translation: French text: These plateaus are often called "vidde", meaning a wide, open space without trees, a boundless expanse.

source: Dans le Rogaland et à Adger, ils sont souvent qualifiés de « hei », ce qui signifie landes déboisées souvent couvertes de bruyère.
reference: In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather.
translation: In Rogaland and Adger they are often called "hei" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather.

source: Les glaciers ne sont pas stables, mais se détachent de la montagne. Cela provoque des fissures, des crevasses, qui peuvent être obscurcies par des ponts de neige.
reference: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges.
translation: French text: Glaciers are not stable, but break away from the mountain. This causes cracks, crevasses, which can be obscured by bridges of snow.

source: Les murs et les toits des grottes de glace peuvent s’effondrer et les fissures se refermer.
reference: The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed.
translation: French text: The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can close.

source: Au bord des glaciers, d'immenses blocs se détachent, tombent, et peut-être rebondissent ou roulent en s'éloignant du bord.
reference: At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
translation: French text: At the edge of glaciers, huge blocks break loose, fall, and perhaps roll or bounce off the edge.

source: La saison touristique des stations de montagne culmine généralement pendant l'été indien.
reference: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer.
translation: French text: The tourist season for mountain stations usually peaks during the Indian summer.

source: Cependant, leur beauté et leur charme évoluent en hiver, avec de nombreuses stations de montagne pourvues de bonnes quantités de neige et proposant des activités telles que le ski et le snowboard.
reference: However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
translation: However, their beauty and charm changes in winter, with many ski resorts and snowboarding areas offering good amounts of snow and activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

source: Seules quelques compagnies aériennes proposent encore des tarifs de deuil, qui réduisent légèrement le coût des voyages funéraires de dernière minute.
reference: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel.
translation: French text: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly reduce the cost of last-minute funeral travel.

source: Les compagnies aériennes qui les proposent sont notamment Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa pour les vols en provenance des États-Unis ou du Canada, et WestJet.
reference: Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet.
translation: Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the United States or Canada, and WestJet.

source: Dans tous les cas, vous devez réserver par téléphone directement auprès de la compagnie aérienne.
reference: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
translation: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
